data.md: And ascending that lordly hill, the mighty monkey magnified himself, desirous of going from the southern to the northern shore of the salt waters.

data.v: अधिरुह्य ततो वीरः पर्वतं पवनात्मजः । ददर्श सागरं भीमं मीनोरगनिषेवितम् ।।
data.es: Then the heroic son of the Windgod, who had ascended the mountain saw the dreadful ocean inhabited by fishes and snakes.
data.anv: ततः then, वीरः hero, पवनात्मजः son of the Windgod, पर्वतम् mountain, अधिरुह्य having ascended, मीनोरगनिषेवितम् inhabited by fishes and sankes, भीमम् dreadful, सागरम् ocean, ददर्श saw.
data.md: And getting to the top of the mountain, that hero, son to the Wind-god, cast his eyes upon the dreadful main inhabited by terrible snakes.

data.v: स मारुत इवाकाशं मारुतस्यात्मसंभवः । प्रपेदे हरिशार्दूलो दक्षिणादुत्तरां दिशम् ।।
data.es: Hanuman, the tiger among monkeys leaped into the sky like the Windgod from the south to the north shore.
data.anv: मारुतस्य Windgod's, आत्मसम्भवः son, सः हरिशार्दूलः that tiger among monkeys, दक्षिणात् from the south, उत्तरांदिशम् towards northern side, मारुतः इव like the windgod, आकाशम् sky, प्रपेदे leaped.
data.md: And that foremost of monkeys, offspring of the Wind-god, (Māruta—this term is used twice in this Sloka, once for Hanumān, and next for the Wind-god. One of these is left out on the score of redundency) (mentally) went from the south to the north, as if it were the air.

data.v: स तदा पीडितस्तेन कपिना पर्वतोत्तमः । ररास सह तैर्भूतैः प्राविशद्वसुधातलम् । कम्पमानैश्च शिखरैः पतद्भिरपि च द्रुमैः ।।
data.es: Pressed under the feet of Hanuman, the great mountain made loud sound sinking into the earth along with all its creatures, with its shaken mountain peaks and uprooted trees dropping down.
data.anv: तदा then, तेन कपिना by that vanara, पीडितः pressed, सः पर्वतोत्तमः that great mountain, तैः those, भूतैः सह along with the creatures, वसुधातलम् to the earth, प्रविशन् while entering, कम्पमानैः with shaking, शिखरैः with peaks, पतद्भिः with dropped, द्रुमैः with trees, ररास crushed down making great sound.
data.md: Then that best of mountains, sore pressed by the monkey, began to emit cries, and with various creatures (on it), entered under the Earth, with its peaks tottering and its trees toppling.

data.v: तस्योरुवेगान्मथिताः पादपाः पुष्पशालिनः । निपेतुर्भूतले रुग्णाः शक्रायुधहता इव ।।
data.es: Shaken by the violent force of Hanuman's thighs, the blossoming trees fell on the ground like sickmen hit by Indra's thunderbolt.
data.anv: तस्य his, ऊरुवेगात् with the force of his thighs, मथिताः shaken, पुष्पशालिनः trees with blossoms, पादपाः trees, रुग्णाः men suffering with diseases, शक्रायुधहता इव as if struck by Indra's thunderbolt, भूतले on the ground, निपेतुः fell.
data.md: And borne down by the violence of his thighs, trees bearing flowers, being shattered, as if destroyed by Sakra's weapon, fell to the ground.

data.v: कन्दरोदरसंस्थानां पीडितानां महौजसाम् । सिंहानां निनदो भीमो नभो भिन्दन्स शुश्रुवे ।।
data.es: The dreadful roar of strong lions, lying in mountaincaves was heard cracking the sky when they were crushed in the turmoil.
data.anv: कन्दरान्तरसंस्थानाम् of those residing in mountain caves, पीडितानाम् of those crushed, महौजसाम् of the powerful ones, सिंहानाम् of lions, भीमः terrific, सः निनदः that noise, नभः sky, भिन्दन् as if breaking, शुश्रुवे was heard.
data.md: The dreadful yells of mighty lions in pain, inhabiting caves, entered the car, piercing the heavens. And Vidyādharis with their attires falling off and their ornaments disordered, suddenly rose from the mountain to the sky. (Dharanidharāt-at-from the holder of the Earth, the latter being supposed to rest on a mountain)

data.v: स्रस्तव्याविद्धवसना व्याकुलीकृतभूषणा । विद्याधर्यः समुत्पेतुः सहसा धरणीधरात् ।।
data.es: The Vidyadharis with their clothes slipped and ornaments disarrayed in fear, at once flew from the mountain.
data.anv: विद्याधर्यः Vidyadharis, त्रस्तव्यावृत्तवसनाः with their clothes slipped with fear, व्याकुलीकृतभूषणाः with ornaments disarrayed, सहसा at ones, धरणीधरात् from the mountain, समुत्पेतुः flew.
data.md: The dreadful yells of mighty lions in pain, inhabiting caves, entered the car, piercing the heavens. And Vidyādharis with their attires falling off and their ornaments disordered, suddenly rose from the mountain to the sky. (Dharanidharāt-at-from the holder of the Earth, the latter being supposed to rest on a mountain)

data.v: अतिप्रमाणा बलिनो दीप्तजिह्वा महाविषाः । निपीडितशिरोग्रीवा व्यवेष्टन्त महाहयः ।।
data.es: Highly powerful, huge and poisonous snakes with their glowing tongues protruded, pressed on their heads and necks (by Hanuman).
data.anv: अतिप्रमाणाः very big ones in size, बलिनः strong ones, दीप्तजिह्वाः with glowing tongues, महाविषाः highly poisonous, महाहयः huge snakes, निपीडितशिरोग्रीवाः pressed on their heads and necks, व्यचेष्टन्त started protruding.
data.md: And exceedingly powerful and mighty snakes of virulent venom, having flaming tongues, with their hoods and necks tortured, began to roll (on the earth).

data.v: किंनरोरगगन्धर्वयक्षविद्याधरास्तथा । पीडितं तं नगवरं त्यक्त्वा गगनमास्थिताः ।।
data.es: Then the kinnaras, uragas, gandhravas, yakshas and vidyadharas left the tortured mountain and occupied the sky.
data.anv: तदा then, किन्नरोरगगन्धर्वयक्षविद्याधराः kinnaras, uragas, gandharvas, yakshas and vidyadharas, पीडितम् tormented, तं नगवरम् that mountain, त्यक्त्वा having left, गगनम् to the sky, आस्थिताः occupied.
data.md: And Kinnar and serpents, Gandharvas, Yaksas and Vidyadharas, forsaking that foremost of mountains in affliction, took refuge in the sky.

data.v: स च भूमिधरः श्रीमान्बलिना तेन पीडितः । सवृक्षशिखरोदग्राः प्रविवेश रसातलम् ।।
data.es: Crushed by the powerful Hanuman, that prosperous mountain with its trees standing and tall peaks sank into the underworld.
data.anv: बलिना by the powerful one, तेन by him, पीडितः crushed, सवृक्षशिखरोदग्रः along with its trees and standing tall peaks, श्रीमान् prosperous, सः भूमिधरश्च that mountain, रसातलम् underworld, प्रविवेश entered.
data.md: And that graceful mountain also, tormented by that powerful one, entered the nether regions with its tall trees and summits.

data.v: दशयोजनविस्तारस्त्रिंशद्योजनमुच्छ्रितः । धरण्यां समतां यातः स बभूव धराधरः ।।
data.es: That mountain of ten yojanas in width and thirty yojanas in height got levelled with the earth.
data.anv: दशयोजनविस्तारः ten yojanas in width, त्रिंशद्योजनम् thirty yojanas, उच्छ्रितः in height, सः धराधरः that mountain, धरण्याम् along with, समताम् equal, यातः reduced, बभूव became.
data.md: That mountain, which (heretofore) had measured ten Yojanas in area and thirty in height, became level with the earth.

data.v: सचन्द्रकुमुदं रम्यं सार्ककारण्डवं शुभम् । तिष्यश्रवणकदम्बमभ्रशैवलशाद्वलम् ।।
पुनर्वसु महामीनं लोहिताङ्गमहाग्रहम् । ऐरावतमहाद्वीपं स्वातीहंसविलोडितम् ।।
वातसंघातजातोर्मिं चन्द्रांशुशिशिराम्बुमत् । भुजंगयक्षगन्धर्वप्रबुद्धकमलोत्पलम् ।।
ग्रसमान इवाकाशं ताराधिपमिवालिखन् । हरन्निव सनक्षत्रं गगनं सार्कमण्डलम् ।।
data.es: Great Hanuman, son of the Windgod, flew through the abode of the Windgod as if he was swallowing the space, scratching the Moon, lord of the stars, as if seizing the heavens along with the constellation of Sun and stars and as though he was drawing the clusters of clouds.
data.anv: मारुतस्य Windgod's, आत्मजः son, श्रीमान् prosperous, महान् great, कपिः monkey, हनुमान् Hanuman, व्योमचरः who moves through the wind, आकाशम् sky, ग्रसमानः इव as if swallowing, ताराधिपम् lord of stars, उल्लिखन्निव as if scratching, सनक्षत्रम् with the stars, सार्कमण्डलम् constellation of Sun, गगनम् sky, हरन्निव as if seizing, मेघजालानि विकर्षन्निव drawing the clusters of clouds, गच्छति flew.
data.md: As if swallowing up the welkin and touching the lord of stars, abolishing the sky decorated with stars and the solar disc, and cleaving the clouds, the unfatigued Hanuman began to cross over that sea.

data.v: मारुतस्यालयं श्रीमान्कपिर्व्योमचरो महान् । हनूमान्मेघजालानि विकर्षन्निव गच्छति ।।
data.es: Great Hanuman, son of the Windgod, flew through the abode of the Windgod as if he was swallowing the space, scratching the Moon, lord of the stars, as if seizing the heavens along with the constellation of Sun and stars and as though he was drawing the clusters of clouds.
data.anv: मारुतस्य Windgod's, आत्मजः son, श्रीमान् prosperous, महान् great, कपिः monkey, हनुमान् Hanuman, व्योमचरः who moves through the wind, आकाशम् sky, ग्रसमानः इव as if swallowing, ताराधिपम् lord of stars, उल्लिखन्निव as if scratching, सनक्षत्रम् with the stars, सार्कमण्डलम् constellation of Sun, गगनम् sky, हरन्निव as if seizing, मेघजालानि विकर्षन्निव drawing the clusters of clouds, गच्छति flew.

data.v: पाण्डुरारुणवर्णानि नीलमाञ्जिष्ठकानि च । हरितारुणवर्णानि महाभ्राणि चकाशिरे ।।
data.es: While Hanuman was drawing big clouds which were either white or red or blue or yellow, he looked charming.
data.anv: कपिना by the vanara, आकृष्यमाणानि drawing, पाण्डुरारुणवर्णानि white and red colour, नीलमाञ्जिष्ठकानि च blue and yellow clouds, महाभ्राणि big clouds, चकाशिरे shining.
data.md: And (on all sides) mighty masses of clouds, sable, crimson, blue, Manjistha-hued, and greenred, looked exceedingly beautiful.

data.v: प्रविशन्नभ्रजालानि निष्क्रमंश्च पुनः पुनः । प्रच्छन्नश्च प्रकाशश्च चन्द्रमा इव लक्ष्यते ।।
data.es: Entering into and emerging from the clouds, he looked like the Moon that appears and disappears (behind a bank of clouds).
data.anv: अभ्रजालानि strings of clouds, पुनः पुनः again and again, प्रविशन् while entering, निष्पतंश्च and while coming out, प्रच्छन्नश्च hiding, प्रकाशश्च and shining, चन्द्रमाः इव like the Moon, लक्ष्यते was seen.
data.md: And now entering into clouds and now imerging from them, he, again and again becoming visible and lost to sight, looked like the Moon.

data.v: नदन्नादेन महता मेघस्वनमहास्वनः । आजगाम महातेजाः पुनर्मध्येन सागरम् ।।
पर्वतेन्द्रं सुनाभं च समुपस्पृश्य वीर्यवान् । ज्यामुक्त इव नाराचो महावेगोऽभ्युपागतः ।।
data.es: The valiant Hanuman touched the lord of mountains fondly and went with great speed just as an arrow released from the centre of a powerful bowstring.
data.anv: वीर्यवान् hero, पर्वतेन्द्रम् lord of mountains,सुनाभं च from the centre, समुपस्पृश्य touched fondly, ज्यामुक्तः telling everything, नाराचः इव like the arrow from a powerful bowstring, महावेगः with great speed, अभ्युपागतः went.
data.md: And touching Mainaka-foremost of mountains-that one endowed with prowess proceeded amain like an iron dart let go from a string.

data.v: स किंचिदनुसंप्राप्तः समालोक्य महागिरिम् । महेन्द्रमेघसंकाशं ननाद हरिपुंगवः ।।
data.es: The chief of the monkeys arrived near, and beholding the face of the Mahendra mountain, which resembled a mass of clouds, thundered.
data.anv: सः he, हरिपुङ्गवः chief of monkeys, महागिरिम् great mountain, मेघसङ्काशम् resembling the mass of cloud, महेन्द्रम् Mahendra, किञ्चित् a little, अनुसम्प्राप्तः coming near, समालोक्य beholding, ननाद thundered.
data.md: And from a distance approaching and beholding that mighty mountain, Mahendra, resembling clouds, that redoubted monkey began to roar.

data.v: निशम्य नदतो नादं वानरास्ते समन्ततः । बभूवुरुत्सुकाः सर्वे सुहृद्दर्शनकाङ्क्षिणः ।।
data.es: On hearing the loud voice of Hanuman, all the vanaras were longing to see their friend.
data.anv: समन्ततः together, सर्वे all of them, ते वानराः those vanaras, नदतः chattering, नादम् voice, निशम्य hearing, सुहृद्धर्शनकाङ्क्षिणः waiting to see their friend, उत्सुकाः eager, बभूवुः became.
data.md: Hearing those sounds as he kept crying, those monkeys (sitting) around, eager to see their friend, became extremely anxious.

data.v: जाम्बवान्स हरिश्रेष्ठः प्रीतिसंहृष्टमानसः । उपामन्त्र्य हरीन्सर्वानिदं वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Jambavan the chief of vanaras became very happy at heart and called all the vanaras and spoke:
data.anv: हरिश्रेष्ठः chief of vanaras, सः जाम्बवान् that Jambavan, प्रीतिसंहृष्टमानसः very happy at heart, सर्वान् all, हरीन् monkeys, उपामन्त्य्र called, इदम् these, वचनम् words, अब्रवीत् spoke.
data.md: And that best of monkeys, Jambavan, with a joyful heart addressing all the monkeys, said.

data.v: सर्वथा कृतकार्योऽसौ हनूमान्नात्र संशयः । न ह्यस्याकृतकार्यस्य नाद एवंविधो भवेत् ।।
data.es: "Oh Hanuman is always successful. If he has not, he would not make sounds in this manner".
data.anv: असौ Oh that, हनुमान् Hanuman, सर्वथा always, कृतकार्यः successful, अकृतकार्यस्य if he was not successsful, अस्य his, नादः sound, एवंविधः in this manner, न भवेत् हि will not be so.
data.md: Hanumān has succeeded completely. There is no doubt about this. If he were unsuccessful, he would not utter shouts as these.

data.v: तस्या बाहूरुवेगं च निनादं च महात्मनः । निशम्य हरयो हृष्टाः समुत्पेतुस्ततस्ततः ।।
data.es: Hearing the sound of his dashing movements of arms and thighs the vanaras jumped about in joy, then and there.
data.anv: महात्मनः great self, तस्य his, बहूरुवेगं च speed of his arms and thighs, निनादं च sounds, निशम्य rejoiced, हृष्टाः joyful, हरयः vanaras, ततस्ततः then and there, समुत्पेतुः jumped in joy.
data.md: And hearing the sounds produced by the violent movements of the arms of that highsouled (hero), as well as the shouts of that magnanimous one, the monkeys, filled with delight, leapt up on all sides.

data.v: ते नगाग्रान्नगाग्राणि शिखराच्छिखराणि च । प्रहृष्टाः समपद्यन्त हनूमन्तं दिदृक्षवः ।।
data.es: The vanaras were very happy. Longing to see Hanuman, they jumped from one tree top to another and from one peak of a mountain to the other.
data.anv: ते those vanaras, प्रहृष्टाः very happy, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, दिदृक्षवः longing to see him, नगाग्रात् from the top of a tree, नगाग्राणि to another tree top, शिखरात् from the peak of mountain, शिखराणि च to another peak of a mountain, समपद्यन्त jumped.
data.md: And they, eager to have a sight of Hanumān, joyfully went from mountain-top to mountaintop and from peak on to peak.

data.v: ते प्रीताः पादपाग्रेषु गृह्य शाखाः सुपुष्पिताः । वासांसीव प्रकाशानि समाविध्यन्त वानराः ।।
data.es: Waiting for Hanuman, the vanaras jumped from the tree tops holding the branches. They shook the branches just like clothes to welcome friends.
data.anv: ते वानराः those vanaras, प्रीताः happily, पादपाग्रेषु from the tree top, शाखाः branches, गृह्य holding, सुविष्ठिताः waiting, प्रशाखाः the branches, वासांसीव like clothes, समाविध्यन्त shook them.
data.md: And influenced by joy, the monkeys remained holding a bough at the top of a tree, and waving their clean apparels.

data.v: तमभ्रघनसंकाशमापतन्तं महाकपिम् । दृष्ट्वा ते वानराः सर्वे तस्थुः प्राञ्जलयस्तदा ।।
data.es: (On seeing) Hanuman, who was resembling a heavy cloud approaching, the vanaras stood with folded hands.
data.anv: तदा then, अभ्रघनसङ्काशम् resembling heavy cloud, आपतन्तम् approaching, तं महाकपिम् that great vanara, दृष्ट्वा having seen, ते those, वानराः vanaras, प्राञ्जलयः with folded hands, तस्थुः stood.
data.md: And seeing that mighty monkey resembling a mass of clouds, alighting, those monkeys stood joining their hands.

data.v: ततस्तु वेगवांस्तस्य गिरेर्गिरिनिभः कपिः । निपपात महेन्द्रस्य शिखरे पादपाकुले ।।
data.es: Thereafter the vanara, who resembled a mountain, descended with great speed on the summit of mount Mahendra full of trees.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, गिरिनिभः of mountain size, वेगवान् with great speed, कपिः monkey, तस्य on that, महेन्द्रस्य Mahendra's,  गिरेः mountain, पादपाकुले full of trees, शिखरे summit, निपपात descended.
data.md: Then the vehement monkey resembling a hill, having leapt up from that mountain, alighted on the top of that (other) mountain (Mahendra) filled with trees.

data.v: ततस्ते प्रीतमनसः सर्वे वानरपुंगवाः । हनूमन्तं महात्मानं परिवार्योपतस्थिरे ।।
data.es: Feeling very happy at heart all the vanara leaders gathered around Hanuman. They stood motionless with extreme happiness.
data.anv: ततः then, सर्वे all, ते of them, वानरपुङ्गवाः vanara leaders, प्रीतमनसः happy at heart, महात्मानम् that great self, हनुमन्तम् to Hanuman, परिवार्य surrounded, उपतस्थिरे without moving, ते सर्वे all of them, परिवार्य around, पराम् extreme, प्रीतिम् joyful, उपागताः became.
data.md: Then with joyful hearts, all the principal monkeys stood encircling the high-souled Hanuman.

data.v: परिवार्य च ते सर्वे परां प्रीतिमुपागताः । प्रहृष्टवदनाः सर्वे तमरोगमुपागतम् ।।
data.md: And surrounding him, they experienced excess of delight, and drew near the newcomer with joyful faces. And bringing fruits and roots, the monkeys honoured that chief of monkeys, the offspring of the Wind-god.

data.v: उपायनानि चादाय मूलानि च फलानि च । प्रत्यर्चयन्हरिश्रेष्ठं हरयो मारुतात्मजम् ।।
data.es: The vanaras were filled with joy seeing Hanuman who returned unhurt. They offered roots and fruits to him. Hanuman on his part offered salutations to the foremost of the monkeys.
data.anv: सर्वे हरयः the vanaras, प्रहृष्टवदनाः face filled with joy, मूलानि च even roots, फलानि च and fruits, उपायनानि gifts, आदाय offered, आरोगम् without being hurt, उपागतम् returned, हरिश्रेष्ठम् foremost of monkeys, मारुतात्मजम् son of the Windgod, प्रत्यर्पयन् offered salutations.
data.md: And surrounding him, they experienced excess of delight, and drew near the newcomer with joyful faces. And bringing fruits and roots, the monkeys honoured that chief of monkeys, the offspring of the Wind-god.

data.v: विनेदुर्मुदिताः केचिच्चक्रुः किल किलां तथा । हृष्टाः पादपशाखाश्च आनिन्युर्वानरर्षभाः ।।
data.md: And some, filled with delight, sent shouts, and some raised ululations; and the foremost monkeys fetched branches of trees. (To serve for a seat for Hanuman)

data.v: हनूमांस्तु गुरून्वृद्धाञ्जाम्बवत्प्रमुखांस्तदा । कुमारमङ्गदं चैव सोऽवन्दत महाकपिः ।।
data.es: The great Hanuman also offered salutations to elders, preceptors such as Jambavan and other leaders. He also saluted the young Angada.
data.anv: तदा then, महाकपिः great monkey, हनुमांस्तु Hanuman also, गुरून् preceptors, वृद्धान् elders, जाम्बवत्प्रमुखान् Jambavan and other leaders, कुमारम् to the young, अङ्गदं चैव Angada also, अवन्दत  saluted.
data.md: And that mighty monkey, Hanumān, saluted his superiors an the aged, headed by Jāmbavan, as well as Prince Angada.

data.v: स ताभ्यां पूजितः पूज्यः कपिभिश्च प्रसादितः । दृष्टा देवीति विक्रान्तः संक्षेपेण न्यवेदयत् ।।
data.es: The valiant Hanuman worthy of worship having been honoured by both Jambavan and Angada was pleased. He responded briefly, saying 'Saw Sita'.
data.anv: विक्रान्तः valiant one, पूज्यः worthy of worship, सः he, ताभ्याम् both, पूजितः having been honoured, कपिभिः by vanaras also, प्रसादितः pleased, सीता Sita, दृष्टा saw, इति this, सङ्क्षेपेण briefly, न्यवेदयत् revealed.
data.md: And honoured by the monkeys as he very well deserved to be, and gratified by them, (he) briefly said—“Seen have I the exalted lady."

data.v: निषसाद च हस्तेन गृहीत्वा वालिनः सुतम् । रमणीये वनोद्देशे महेन्द्रस्य गिरेस्तदा ।।
data.es: Then holding the hand of Vali's son he sat down at a beautiful location of the garden of mountain Mahendra.
data.anv: तदा then, वालिनः Vali's, सुतम् son, हस्तेन with hand, गृहीत्वा holding, महेन्द्रस्य गिरेः Mahendra mountain, रमणीये beautiful, वनोद्धेशे place of the garden, निषसाद च sat down.
data.md: Taking Vāli's son by the hand, he sat him down in a charming tract of the woodland belonging to the mountain Mahendra. Then asked (by them), Hanumān addressed those foremost monkeys, "I have seen Janaka's daughter in the Asoka woods."

data.v: हनूमानब्रवीद्धृष्टस्तदा तान्वानरर्षभान् । अशोकवनिकासंस्था दृष्टा सा जनकात्मजा ।।
data.es: Hanuman felt happy and told Angada, the bull of vanaras, "I saw Sita in the groves of Ashoka guarded by dreadful ogres. She is blameless, eager to see Rama. She is wearing a single braid of hair. She is young and emaciated due to fasting. Her hair is matted and soiled".
data.anv: तदा then, हृष्टः became happy, हनुमान् Hanuman, तान् them, वानरर्षभान् bull among vanaras, अब्रवीत् said, अशोकवनिकासंस्था in the groves of Ashoka trees, सुघोराभिः very dreadful, राक्षसीभिः demons, रक्ष्यमाणा guarded by, अनिन्दिता blameless lady, एकवेणीधरा having one braid, बाला young, रामदर्शनलालसा with eagerness to see Rama, उपवासपरिश्रान्ता emaciated due to fasting, जटिला hair matted, मलिना soiled, कृशा weakened, सा जनकात्मजा that Janaka's daughter, दृष्टा saw.
data.md: Taking Vāli's son by the hand, he sat him down in a charming tract of the woodland belonging to the mountain Mahendra. Then asked (by them), Hanumān addressed those foremost monkeys, "I have seen Janaka's daughter in the Asoka woods."

data.v: रक्ष्यमाणा सुघोराभी राक्षसीभिरनिन्दिता । एकवेणीधरा बाला रामदर्शनलालसा । उपवासपरिश्रान्ता मलिना जटिला कृशा ।।
data.es: Hanuman felt happy and told Angada, the bull of vanaras, "I saw Sita in the groves of Ashoka guarded by dreadful ogres. She is blameless, eager to see Rama. She is wearing a single braid of hair. She is young and emaciated due to fasting. Her hair is matted and soiled".
data.anv: तदा then, हृष्टः became happy, हनुमान् Hanuman, तान् them, वानरर्षभान् bull among vanaras, अब्रवीत् said, अशोकवनिकासंस्था in the groves of Ashoka trees, सुघोराभिः very dreadful, राक्षसीभिः demons, रक्ष्यमाणा guarded by, अनिन्दिता blameless lady, एकवेणीधरा having one braid, बाला young, रामदर्शनलालसा with eagerness to see Rama, उपवासपरिश्रान्ता emaciated due to fasting, जटिला hair matted, मलिना soiled, कृशा weakened, सा जनकात्मजा that Janaka's daughter, दृष्टा saw.
data.md: That blameless one is guarded by dreadful Räkşasīs. The girl wear a single braid of hair, and burn to attain a sight of Rāma. She is faint in consequence of fasting, and dirty, wear matted locks and is emaciated.

data.v: ततो दृष्टेति वचनं महार्थममृतोपमम् । निशम्य मारुतेः सर्वे मुदिता वानरा भवन् ।।
data.es: Then hearing Hanuman's meaningful and nectarlike words all the vanaras rejoiced.
data.anv: ततः then, दृष्टा seeing, इति thus, मारुतेः Hanuman, महार्थम् most meaningful, अमृतोपमम् like nectar, वचनम् these words, निशम्य hearing, सर्वे all, वानराः vanara, मुदिताः joyful, अभवन् remained.
data.md: Hearing the words, "I have seen" from the Wind-god's offspring resembling ambrosia, all the monkeys were filled with rejoicing.

data.v: क्ष्वेडन्त्यन्ये नदन्त्यन्ये गर्जन्त्यन्ये महाबलाः । चक्रुः किल किलामन्ये प्रतिगर्जन्ति चापरे ।।
data.es: Some powerful vanaras howled, some chattered, some roared and some screamed, going round and round and others echoed the sounds.
data.anv: महाबलाः powerful, अन्ये others, क्ष्वेलन्ति howled, अन्ये some others, नदन्ति chattered, अन्ये some others, गर्जन्ति roared like lion, अन्ये some, किलकिलाम् screamed, चक्रुः round and round, आपरे went, प्रतिगर्जन्ति echoed the roaring.
data.md: And thereupon, some of mighty ones roared, and some shouted, and some blustered, and some raised ululations, and others stormed (in return).

data.v: केचिदुच्छ्रितलाङ्गूलाः प्रहृष्टाः कपिकुञ्जराः । अञ्चितायतदीर्घाणि लाङ्गूलानि प्रविव्यधुः ।।
data.es: Some elephantlike vanaras who were excited and felt overjoyed lifted their long and beautiful tails and hit them on the ground.
data.anv: प्रहृष्टाः very exited with joy, केचित् a few, कपिकुञ्जराः elephants among monkeys, उच्छ्रितलाङ्गूलाः lifted their tails, आयताञ्चितदीर्घाणि beautiful and long ones, लाङ्गूलानि tails, प्रविव्यधुः hit on the ground.
data.md: And some elephantine monkeys in joy upraised their tails, and some lashed with their long and broad tails.

data.v: अपरे तु हनूमन्तं वानरा वारणोपमम् । आप्लुत्य गिरिशृङ्गेभ्यः संस्पृशन्ति स्म हर्षिताः ।।
data.es: A few vanaras jumped down from the mountain top and hugged the elephantlike Hanuman.
data.anv: आपरे a few, वानराः vanaras, हर्षिताः in happiness, गिरिशृङ्गेभ्यः from the top of the mountain, आप्लुत्य jumped down, वारणोपमम् elephantlike, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, संस्पृशन्ति स्म hugged.
data.md: And others, transported with joy, bounding up to the mountain-summit, touched that foremost of monkeys, the handsome Hanumān.

data.v: उक्तवाक्यं हनूमन्तमङ्गदस्तु तदाब्रवीत् । सर्वेषां हरिवीराणां मध्ये वाचमनुत्तमाम् ।।
data.es: And hearing Hanuman's sweetest words, Angada addressed the heroic vanaras
data.anv: अथ and then, अङ्गदः Angada, उक्तवाक्यम् words spoken, हनूमन्तम् by Hanuman, सर्वेषाम् all of them, हरिवीराणाम् vanara heroes, मध्ये midst, उत्तमम् best, वचनम् words, अब्रवीत् spoke.
data.md: When Hanumān had ended, Angada said these excellent words in the midst of the heroic monkeys.

data.v: सत्त्वे वीर्ये न ते कश्चित्समो वानरविद्यते । यदवप्लुत्य विस्तीर्णं सागरं पुनरागतः ।।
data.es: "O vanara you have leaped such a wide ocean and have returned. In strength and valour. There is none equal to you.
data.anv: वानर vanara, यत् such, विस्तीर्णम् wide, सागरम् ocean, अवप्लुत्य leaping, पुनः again, आगतः returned, सत्त्वे in strength, वीर्ये in valour, ते to you, समः equal, कश्चित् none, न विद्यते not known.
data.md: There is none, O monkey, that is like to you in strength and prowess. As having bounded over the spacious main, you had come back (here), you are, O excellent monkey, the only giver of our lives. By your grace it is that, our end attained, we shall meet with Rāghava.

data.v: दिष्ट्या दृष्टा त्वया देवी रामपत्नी यशस्विनी । दिष्ट्या त्यक्ष्यति काकुत्स्थः शोकं सीता वियोगजम् ।।
data.es: "O your devotion to the king, O your valour, fortitude and courage is admirable. You could see Rama's wife, an illustrious lady. This is a matter of our good luck. Rama will (now) shed the sorrow due to separation from Sita.
data.anv: स्वामिनि to the king, ते to you, भक्तिः devotion, अहो Oh, वीर्यम् valour, अहो Oh, धृतिः fortitude, अहो Oh, दिष्ट्या courage, त्वया of yours, रामपत्नी Rama's wife, यशस्विनी illustrious, देवी wife, दृष्टा saw, दिष्ट्या our luck, काकुत्स्थः Rama, सीतावियोगजम् born of separation from Sita, शोकम् grief, त्यक्ष्यति will be removed.
data.md: Oh for your fidelity! Oh for your prowess! Oh for your fortitude! By luck had you seen that exalted one, the illustrious wife of Rāma, by luck it is that Kākutstha shall forego his sorrow in consequence of separation from Sītā.

data.v: ततोऽङ्गदं हनूमन्तं जाम्बवन्तं च वानराः । परिवार्य प्रमुदिता भेजिरे विपुलाः शिलाः ।।
data.es: Then the vanaras went round all the three Angada, Hanuman and Jambavan. Out of joy they lay down on the huge rocks.
data.anv: ततः then, वानराः vanaras, प्रमुदिताः very happily, अङ्गदम् Angada's, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, जाम्बवन्तं च and Jambavan, परिवार्य and going round, विपुलाः extensive, शिलाः rocks, भेजिरे betook to.

data.v: श्रोतुकामाः समुद्रस्य लङ्घनं वानरोत्तमाः । दर्शनं चापि लङ्कायाः सीताया रावणस्य च । तस्थुः प्राञ्जलयः सर्वे हनूमद्वदनोन्मुखाः ।।
data.es: All the vanaras longing to listen to Hanuman about his crossing the ocean, seeing Lanka, Sita and Ravana kept looking at the face of Hanuman.
data.anv: सर्वे all, वानरोत्तमाः best of vanaras, समुद्रस्य at the ocean, लङ्घनम् crossing, लङ्कायाः of Lanka, सीतायाः about Sita, रावणस्य च and Ravana, दर्शनं चापि and seeing, श्रोतुकामाः longing to listen, प्राञ्जलयः with folded palms, हनुमद्वचनोन्मुखाः from the mouth of Hanuman, तस्थुः kept watching.

data.v: तस्थौ तत्राङ्गदः श्रीमान्वानरैर्बहुभिर्वृतः । उपास्यमानो विबुधैर्दिवि देवपतिर्यथा ।।
data.es: Surrounded by many great vanaras, Angada was shining like Indra, lord of the gods attended by the gods in heaven.
data.anv: तत्र there, श्रीमान् great, बहुभिः many, वानरैः vanaras, वृतः surrounded, अङ्गदः Angada, दिवि heaven, विबुधैः by gods, उपास्यमानः attended by, देवपति: यथा like the lord of gods, तस्थौ shining.
data.md: The graceful Angada was there, surrounded by many monkeys, and honoured by them, even as the lord of celestials is honoured in heaven by the celestials.

data.v: हनूमता कीर्तिमता यशस्विना; तथाङ्गदेनाङ्गदबद्धबाहुना । मुदा तदाध्यासितमुन्नतं मह;न्महीधराग्रं ज्वलितं श्रियाभवत् ।।
data.es: The mountain peak graced by famous Hanuman and renowned Angada bedecked with armlets seated on top joyfully, appeared prosperous and splendid.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे सप्तपञ्चाशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fiftyseventh sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: कीर्तिमता famed, हनूमता Hanuman, तथा that way, यशस्विना renowned, अङ्गदबद्धबाहुना bedecked with armlets, अङ्गदेन by Angada, तदा then, मुदा joyfully, अध्यासितम् seated, उन्नतम् high, महत् great, महीधराग्रम् top of the mountain, तदा then, या propsperous, ज्वलितं splendid, अभवत् remained.
data.md: When the famous and renowned Hanumān, and Angada with bracelets on his arms, had sat down, the elevated and mighty mountain-summit was illuminated with splendour.

data.v: ततस्तस्य गिरेः शृङ्गे महेन्द्रस्य महाबलाः । हनुमत्प्रमुखाः प्रीतिं हरयो जग्मुरुत्तमाम् ।।
data.es: Then the mighty Hanuman and other vanaras having assembled on the summit of mountain Mahendra and felt vey much happy.
data.anv: ततः then, महाबलाः mighty, हनुमत्प्रमुखाः Hanuman the foremost, हरयः among vanaras, तस्य that, महेन्द्रस्यगिरेः on the mountain Mahendra, शृङ्गे summit, उत्तमाम् very much, प्रीतिम् rejoiced, जग्मुः went.
data.md: Then on the summit of the mountain, Mahendra, those powerful monkeys, headed by Hanumān, rejoiced exceedingly.

data.v: तं ततः प्रतिसंहृष्टः प्रीतिमन्तं महाकपिम् । जाम्बवान्कार्यवृत्तान्तमपृच्छदनिलात्मजम् ।।
data.es: Thereafter, very delighted Jambavan inquired Hanuman most affectionately of all that happened.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, प्रीतिसंहृष्टः very delighted, जाम्बवान् Jambavan, प्रीतिमन्तम् very affectionately, महाकपिम् great monkey, अनिलात्मजम् Hanuman, कार्यवृत्तान्तम् all that happened, अपृच्छत् inquired.

data.v: कथं दृष्टा त्वया देवी कथं वा तत्र वर्तते । तस्यां वा स कथं वृत्तः क्रूरकर्मा दशाननः ।।
data.es: "How did you find the godlike lady? How was she? How was the tenheaded one, cruel in action, behaving with her? You may narrate what she said.
data.anv: देवी divine lady, त्वया by you, कथम् how, दृष्टा was she found, तत्र there, कथं वा how is she, वर्तते behaving, क्रूरकर्मा cruel in action, सः दशाननः that tenheaded one, तस्याम् with her, कथंवृत्तः you narrate (what she said).

data.v: तत्त्वतः सर्वमेतन्नः प्रब्रूहि त्वं महाकपे । श्रुतार्थाश्चिन्तयिष्यामो भूयः कार्यविनिश्चयम् ।।
data.es: "O Hanuman, tell us in detail the entire thing. On hearing it, we will think about the next course of action.
data.anv: महाकपे great vanara, एतत् all that, सर्वम् entire, तत्त्वतः truly, त्वम् you, नः us, प्रब्रूहि after knowing, श्रुतार्थाः after hearing, भूयःकार्यविनिश्चयम् next course of action, चिन्तयिष्यामः will think .
data.md: How could you track the exalted lady? And what did she say in reply (to your querries)?, Having learnt the real state of things, we shall decide what is to be done.

data.v: यश्चार्थस्तत्र वक्तव्यो गतैरस्माभिरात्मवान् । रक्षितव्यं च यत्तत्र तद्भवान्व्याकरोतु नः ।।
data.es: "You are wise and you should tell us in detail what is to be told and what has to be hidden when we report."
data.anv: गतैः when we go, अस्माभिः we too, तत्र there, यः that which, अर्थः meaningful, वक्तव्यः will tell, यत् that which, तत्र there, रक्षितव्यं च to be hidden, तत् that, आत्मवान् yourself, भवान् you are wise, नः to us, व्याकरोतु tell us in detail.
data.md: And do you also tell us what we, repairing there, shall unfold to that one of controlled self and what we shall keep to ourselves.

data.v: स नियुक्तस्ततस्तेन संप्रहृष्टतनूरुहः । नमस्यञ्शिरसा देव्यै सीतायै प्रत्यभाषत ।।
data.es: Having been asked (by Jambavan and others) Hanuman with horripilations all over his body, bowed down and saluted in the direction of queen Sita and began:
data.anv: तेन by him, नियुक्तः having been asked, सः he, सम्प्रहृष्टतनूरुहः horripilations all over his body out of joy, ततः then, देव्यै to queen, सीतायै to Sita, शिरसा bowed down head, प्रणम्य saluted, प्रत्यभाषत began telling.
data.md: Thus directed by him, that one (Hanumān) with his down standing on end, bowing down the head to that revered one, Sītā, replied.

data.v: प्रत्यक्षमेव भवतां महेन्द्राग्रात्खमाप्लुतः । उदधेर्दक्षिणं पारं काङ्क्षमाणः समाहितः ।।
data.es: "I rose upwards leaping into the sky, intent on reaching the southern shore from the mountain Mahendra.It has been witnessed directly by all of you.
data.anv: उदधेः rose up, दक्षिणम् southern, पारम् shore, काङ्क्षमाणः you have seen, समाहितः intent on, भवताम् all of you, प्रत्यक्षमेव directly, महेन्द्राग्रात् Mahendra mountain, खम् sky, आप्लुतः leaping.
data.md: In your sight, I bounded up with concentrated mind, eager to reach the southern shore of the ocean.

data.v: गच्छतश्च हि मे घोरं विघ्नरूपमिवाभवत् । काञ्चनं शिखरं दिव्यं पश्यामि सुमनोहरम् ।।
data.es: "Even as I was leaping I saw a terrific and wonderful golden peak which came as if to obstruct me on my path.
data.anv: गच्छतः while I was going, मे I, घोरम् terrific, विघ्नरूपमिव like a form that came to obstruct, अभवत् saw, काञ्चनम् golden, दिव्यम् wonderful, सुमनोहरम् very beautiful, शिखरम् peak of mountain, पश्यामि saw.
data.md: As I voyaged on, a great impediment occurred in the way. I saw a goodly and noble golden peak, standing, obstructing my way. I found the mountain as an obstacle to my course.

data.v: स्थितं पन्थानमावृत्य मेने विघ्नं च तं नगम् ।।
उपसंगम्य तं दिव्यं काञ्चनं नगसत्तमम् । कृता मे मनसा बुद्धिर्भेत्तव्योऽयं मयेति च ।।
data.es: "The mountain stood on my way turning towards me in order to obstruct me. Then I resolved in my mind that this great, wonderful, golden mountain has to be smashed.
data.anv: पन्थानम् on my way, आवृत्य turning towards, स्थितम् stood, तं नगम् that mountain, विघ्नम् to obstruct, मेने my path, दिव्यम् wonderful, काञ्चनम् golden, तं नगसत्तमम् that great mountain, उपसङ्गम्य meeting, अयम् this, मया by me, भेत्तव्यः इति this should be broken, मे मनसा in my mind, बुद्धिः कृता resolved.
data.md: Nearing the grand and splendid golden mount, I thought within myself, 'I will rive this.'

data.v: प्रहतं च मया तस्य लाङ्गूलेन महागिरेः । शिखरं सूर्यसंकाशं व्यशीर्यत सहस्रधा ।।
data.es: "Hit by my tail the great mountain peak, which was radiating like the Sun was shattered into a thousand pieces.
data.anv: मया by me, लाङ्गूलेन with my tail, प्रहतम् hit, तस्य महागिरेः that great mountain, सूर्यसङ्काशम् radiating like the Sun, शिखरम् peak, सहस्रधा a thousand pieces, व्यशीर्यत shattered.
data.md: And the sun-like summit of that mighty mountain, Prahasta, was cleft in a thousand fragments by my tail.

data.v: व्यवसायं च मे बुद्ध्वा स होवाच महागिरिः । पुत्रेति मधुरां बाणीं मनःप्रह्लादयन्निव ।।
data.es: "Perceiving that I am going to smash him he spoke to me in a sweet tone delighting my heart, addressing me like a son.
data.anv: सः महागिरिः that great mountain, तम् him, व्यवसायम् going to smash, बुद्ध्वा perceiving, मनः my mind, प्रह्लादयन्निव delighting, पुत्त्र इति like a son, मधुराम् sweet, वाणीम् tone, उवाच ह spoke.

data.v: पितृव्यं चापि मां विद्धि सखायं मातरिश्वनः । मैनाकमिति विख्यातं निवसन्तं महोदधौ ।।
data.es: 'Know me to be a friend of windgod and so I am like your father's brother. I am dwelling in this great ocean and known as Mainaka.
data.anv: महोदधौ in the great ocean, निवसन्तम् residing, मातरिश्वनः winddeity, सखायम् friend, विख्यातम् called, माम् I, मैनाकमिति Mainaka, पितृव्यं चापि like father's brother, विद्धि you may know.

data.v: पक्ष्ववन्तः पुरा पुत्र बभूवुः पर्वतोत्तमाः । छन्दतः पृथिवीं चेरुर्बाधमानाः समन्ततः ।।
data.es: 'O son in the past, foremost of the mountains too had wings and they used to range at will all over the earth tormenting all.
data.anv: पुत्त्र O son, पुरा in the past, पर्वतोत्तमाः the foremost of mountains, पक्षवन्तः had wings, बभूवुः had, बाधमानाः tormenting, छन्दतः at will, समन्ततः all over, पृथिवीम् the earth, चेरुः ranging.

data.v: श्रुत्वा नगानां चरितं महेन्द्रः पाकशासनः । चिच्छेद भगवान्पक्षान्वज्रेणैषां सहस्रशः ।।
data.es: 'Mahendra, the killer of ogre Paka, heard the story (of the cruel deeds) of mountains and cut off their wings into a thousand pieces with his thunderbolt.
data.anv: पाकशासनः who killed Paka (an ogre), भगवान् god, महेन्द्रः Mahendra, नगानाम् of the mountains, चरितम् the story (of their cruel deeds), श्रुत्वा on hearing, एषाम् their, पक्षान् wings, वज्रेण by the thuinderbolt, सहस्रशः into a thousand pieces, चिच्छेद cut off.

data.v: अहं तु मोक्षितस्तस्मात्तव पित्रा महात्मना । मारुतेन तदा वत्स प्रक्षिप्तोऽस्मि महार्णवे ।।
data.es: 'O son I was saved from Indra by your kind father Maruta who dropped me in this great ocean.
data.anv: वत्स O Son, अहं तु I was also, तव your, पित्रा father, महात्मना great self, मारुतेन of Maruta's, तदा so also, तस्मात् your, मोक्षितः dropped, महार्णवे in this great ocean, प्रक्षिप्तः saved from Indra, अस्मि I am.

data.v: रामस्य च मया साह्ये वर्तितव्यमरिंदम । रामो धर्मभृतां श्रेष्ठो महेन्द्रसमविक्रमः ।।
data.es: 'O subduer of enemiesI must make efforts to help Rama the foremost among the righteous, for I have received help (from your father) who is equal to Indra in valour'.
data.anv: अरिन्दम subduer of enemies, मया by me, रामस्य Rama's, साह्ये received help, वर्तितव्यम् has to make efforts, महेन्द्रसमविक्रमः equal to Mahendra in valour, रामः Rama, धर्मभृताम् among the righteous, श्रेष्ठः foremost.

data.v: एतच्छ्रुत्वा मया तस्य मैनाकस्य महात्मनः । कार्यमावेद्य तु गिरेरुद्धतं च मनो मम ।।
data.es: "When I heard Mainaka, I told him about my intention to go up. That great self Mainaka allowed me.
data.anv: महात्मनः great self, तस्य मैनाकस्य that Mainaka's, वचः words, श्रुत्वा having heard, कार्यम् task, गिरेः mountain, आवेद्य told, मम my, मनः mind, उद्यतम् to go, अहम् I, तेन to him, महात्मना the great self, मैनाकेन by Mainaka, अनुज्ञातश्च granted permission.

data.v: तेन चाहमनुज्ञातो मैनाकेन महात्मना । उत्तमं जवमास्थाय शेषमध्वानमास्थितः ।।
ततोऽहं सुचिरं कालं वेगेनाभ्यगमं पथि । ततः पश्याम्यहं देवीं सुरसां नागमातरम् ।।
समुद्रमध्ये सा देवी वचनं मामभाषत । मम भक्ष्यः प्रदिष्टस्त्वममारैर्हरिसत्तमम् । ततस्त्वां भक्षयिष्यामि विहितस्त्वं चिरस्य मे ।।
data.es: 'O powerful monkey you are destined to be my food provided by the immortals. Therefore, I will eat you as I have I found you after a long time. (of unsatiated hunger).'
data.anv: हरिसत्तम powerful monkey, त्वम् you, मम my, भक्षः food, अमरैः immortals,प्रदिष्टः destined, अतः as such, त्वाम् you, भक्षयिष्यामि I will eat you, त्वम् you, मे my, चिरस्य after a long time, विहितः found you.

data.v: एवमुक्तः सुरसया प्राञ्जलिः प्रणतः स्थितः । विवर्णवदनो भूत्वा वाक्यं चेदमुदीरयम् ।।
data.es: "When addressed thus by Surasa, I bowed low with joined palms, stood before her with my face turned pale, and said:
data.anv: सुरसया by Surasa, एवम् in that way, उक्तः having spoken, प्राञ्जलिः offered salutations with folded palms, प्रणतः bent low, स्थितः stood, विवर्णवदनः face turned pale, भूत्वा became, इदम् these, वाक्यं च and words, उदीरयम् uttered.
data.md: Thus addressed by Surasā, I, remaining in humble guise with joined hands, and with my countenance turned pale, I uttered these words,

data.v: रामो दाशरथिः श्रीमान्प्रविष्टो दण्डकावनम् । लक्ष्मणेन सह भ्रात्रा सीतया च परंतपः ।।
data.es: "Dasaratha's son called Rama accompanied by his brother Lakshmana and his wife Vaidehi entered Dandaka forest.
data.anv: दाशरथिः Dasaratha's son, रामो नाम called Rama, भ्रात्रा with his brother, लक्ष्मणेन सह accompanied by Lakshmana, भार्यया with his wife, वैदेह्या चापि with Vaidehi also, दण्डकावनम् Dandaka forest, प्रविष्टः entered.
data.md: “Rāma, the graceful son of Dasaratha, repressor of foes—has entered the woods of Dandaka, in company with his brother Lakşmaņa and Sītā.

data.v: तस्य सीता हृता भार्या रावणेन दुरात्मना । तस्याः सकाशं दूतोऽहं गमिष्ये रामशासनात् ।।
data.es: 'His wife was abducted by the evilminded Ravana. By Rama's command I am going to meet her as messenger from Rama.'
data.anv: तस्य his, भार्या wife, सीता Sita, दुरात्मना evil minded, रावणेन by Ravana, हृता abducted, अहम् I, रामशासनात् by Rama's command, दूतः messenger, तस्याः her, सङ्काशम् to meet, गमिष्ये going.
data.md: His wife Sītā has been carried off by the wicked Rāvana. At Rāma's mandate I go to her as an envoy.

data.v: कर्तुमर्हसि रामस्य साह्यं विषयवासिनि ।।
data.es: "I am going as Rama's emissary to search for his wife. It is proper for you to render help since you are a resident of his kingdom.
data.anv: अहम् I, रामशासनात् by Rama's command, दूतः emissary, तस्याः her, सकाशम् for, गमिष्ये I shall go, विषयवासिनि O resident of his kingdom, रामस्य of Rama, साह्यम् help, कर्तुम् to render, अर्हसि it proper for you.
data.md: At Rāma's command, I go to her as his envoy. It behove you, living in (Rāma's) dominions, to lend him your help.

data.v: अथ वा मैथिलीं दृष्ट्वा रामं चाक्लिष्टकारिणम् । आगमिष्यामि ते वक्त्रं सत्यं प्रतिशृणोति मे ।।
data.es: "I told her that it is proper for her (living in the domain of Rama) to help his queen and wife. Or else, I promised after I disclose to Rama, Sita's whereabouts, I will come and enter her mouth.
data.anv: अथवा alternatively, मैथिलीम् Mythili, अक्लिष्टकारिणम् one who may makes work easy (without any trouble), रामं च and Rama, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, ते to your, वक्त्रम् mouth, आगमिष्यामि I will reach, सत्यम् truly, ते you, प्रतिशृणोमि I promise.
data.md: In this business, you, O chaste one, should help Rāma. Or having seen Mithila's daughter, as well as Rāma of untiring deeds, I shall come to your mouth, this I promise to you truly.'

data.v: एवमुक्ता मया सा तु सुरसा कामरूपिणी । अब्रवीन्नातिवर्तेत कश्चिदेष वरो मम ।।
data.es: Having heard Hanuman, Surasa capable of taking any form at her free will told him that no one can cross (her region) as she had been given such a boon(by the Creator)৷৷
data.anv: हनुमता by Hanuman, एवम् in that way, उक्ता having been spoken, कामरूपिणी one who can assume any form at free will, सुरसा Surasa, अब्रवीत् said, कश्चित् no one, नातिवर्तेत cannot cross, एषः such, मम to me, वरः boon.
data.md: Thus accosted by me, Surasā, wearing forms at her will, said, 'None is able to escape me. Even this is the boon that I have received.'

data.v: एवमुक्तः सुरसया दशयोजनमायतः । ततोऽर्धगुणविस्तारो बभूवाहं क्षणेन तु ।।
data.es: Provoked by the words of Surasa, Hanuman stretched himself to ten yojanas.
data.anv: तदा then, हनुमान् Hanuman, सुरसां Surasa, इति thus, उक्त्वा having said, क्रुद्धः angry, दशयोजनम् ten yojanas, आयतां wide, दशयोजनविस्तारः ten yojanas in breadth, बभूव became.

data.v: मत्प्रमाणानुरूपं च व्यादितं तन्मुखं तया । तद्दृष्ट्वा व्यादितं त्वास्यं ह्रस्वं ह्यकरवं वपुः ।।
data.es: "She too opened her mouth wide enough for my size. Seeing her distending her mouth, in a moment I became small equal to the size of thumb and came out.
data.anv: तया to go, मुखम् mouth, मत्प्रमाणानुरूपम् commensurate with my size, व्यादितम् opened, व्यादितम् when she opened, तत् that, आस्यम् her, दृष्ट्वा seeing, वपुः form, ह्रस्वम् turned away, आकरवम् to move, तस्मिन् from her, मुहूर्ते in a moment, पुनः again, अङ्गुष्ठमात्रकः of the size of thumb, बभूव became.

data.v: तस्मिन्मुहूर्ते च पुनर्बभूवाङ्गुष्ठसंमितः । अभिपत्याशु तद्वक्त्रं निर्गतोऽहं ततः क्षणात् ।।
अब्रवीत्सुरसा देवी स्वेन रूपेण मां पुनः । अर्थसिद्ध्यै हरिश्रेष्ठ गच्छ सौम्य यथासुखम् ।।
data.anv: सौम्य O noble one, हरिश्रेष्ठ O best of vanaras, अर्थसिद्ध्यै for achieving your purpose, यथासुखम् with pleasure, गच्छ proceed, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, महात्मना with the great self, राघवेण with Raghava, समानयस्व unite.

data.v: समानय च वैदेहीं राघवेण महात्मना । सुखी भव महाबाहो प्रीतास्मि तव वानर ।।
data.es: 'O noble vanara O foremost of the vanaras go and accomplish the task.Unite the great Rama with Vaidehi.O strongarmed vanara, be happy. I am pleased with you'.
data.anv: सौम्य O noble one, हरिश्रेष्ठ foremost of vanaras, अर्थसिद्ध्यै accomplish the task, यथासुखम् happily, गच्छ going, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, महात्मना great self, राघवेण to Raghava, समानय unite, महाबाहो strongarmed, वानर vanara, सुखी be happy, भव you, तव you, प्रीता pleased, अस्मि I am.

data.v: ततोऽहं साधु साध्वीति सर्वभूतैः प्रशंसितः । ततोऽन्तरिक्षं विपुलं प्लुतोऽहं गरुडो यथा ।।
data.es: "Then all creatures praised me saying 'well done well done'. Then I leaped into the vast sky like Garuda.
data.anv: ततः then, अहम् I, सर्वभूतैः all creatures, साधु साध्विति well done, well done, प्रशंसितः praised, ततः then, अहम् I, गरुडो यथा like Garuda, विपुलम् vast, अन्तरिक्षम् sky, प्लुतः leapt .

data.v: छाया मे निगृहीता च न च पश्यामि किंचन । सोऽहं विगतवेगस्तु दिशो दश विलोकयन् । न किंचित्तत्र पश्यामि येन मेऽपहृता गतिः ।।
data.es: "Then I was captured by a shadow of some one. I could not see and I reduced my speed and looked around in all the ten directions. I could not see the one who seized me.
data.anv: मे my, छाया shadow, निगृहीता held, किञ्चन by some one, न च पश्यामि I could not see, विहतवेगः reduced my speed, सः अहम् I, दश दिशः all the ten directions, विलोकयन् looked around, येन even then, मे to me, गतिः one that approached, अपहृता that which seized, किञ्चित् not seen, तत्र न च पश्यामि was not seen.
data.md: And my velocity being deprived, I looked at the ten cardinal points; but I found there naught which could deprive me of my speed.

data.v: ततो मे बुद्धिरुत्पन्ना किं नाम गमने मम । ईदृशो विघ्न उत्पन्नो रूपं यत्र न दृश्यते ।।
data.anv: ततः then, मे my, बुद्धिः intellect, उत्पन्ना arose, मम in me, गगने in the sky, यत्र there, रूपम् form, न दृश्यते not able to see, किं नाम what is her name, ईदृशः not able to discern, विघ्नः  obstructing, उत्पन्नः thought.
data.md: Then I thought, 'What is this obstacle that has suddenly arisen in respect of my course? No form find I here?'

data.v: अधो भागेन मे दृष्टिः शोचता पातिता मया । ततोऽद्राक्षमहं भीमां राक्षसीं सलिले शयाम् ।।
data.es: "Thinking so I looked down into the water and there I saw a terrific shedemon.
data.anv: शोचता thinking so, मया by me, अधोभागेन down, मे I, दृष्टिः saw, पातिता down, ततः there, अहम् I, भीमाम् terrific, सलिलेशयाम् in the water, राक्षसीम् shedemon, अद्राक्षम् I saw.
data.md: And as I stood aggrieved, my glance fell downwards. Then I saw there a dreadful Räksasī supine on the flood.

data.v: प्रहस्य च महानादमुक्तोऽहं भीमया तया । अवस्थितमसंभ्रान्तमिदं वाक्यमशोभनम् ।।
data.es: "She was frightening and laughed in loud voice without any hesitation. Steadfast she uttered these ominous words to me:
data.anv: भीमया frightening, तया she was, महानादम् loud voice, प्रहस्य laughed, अवस्थितम् without any hesitation, असम्भ्रान्तम् steadfast, इदम् this, अशोभनम् inauspicious, वाक्यम् these words, अहम् to me, उक्तः said.
data.md: And laughing (scornfully), that grim one said these inauspicious words to me, who was inert, although undaunted,

data.v: क्वासि गन्ता महाकाय क्षुधिताया ममेप्सितः । भक्षः प्रीणय मे देहं चिरमाहारवर्जितम् ।।
data.es: 'O huge monkey where are you going? I am hungry since long. I am going without food and must eat you. Make me satisfied'.
data.anv: महाकाय one with a huge body, क्व where, गन्ता going, असि you are, क्षुधितायाः I am hungry, मम my, ईप्सितः I am eager, भक्षः to eat, चिरम् for long time, आहारवर्जितम् without food, मे my, देहम् body, प्रीणय make me satisfied.
data.md: Whither are you bound, O you of a gigantic body? Desired by me, who am hungry, do you becoming my food, gratify this body deprived of diet for a long time.

data.v: बाढमित्येव तां वाणीं प्रत्यगृह्णामहं ततः । आस्य प्रमाणादधिकं तस्याः कायमपूरयम् ।।
data.es: "I said 'well' and enlarged my body more than her mouth could hold.
data.anv: अहम् I am, बाढम् इत्येव saying well, तां वाणीम् her mouth, प्रत्यगृह्णाम् ततः then, तस्याः her, अस्यप्रमाणात् more than her size, अधिकम् bigger, कायम् size body, अपूरयम् grew.
data.md: Saying, Well,' I accepted her speech, increasing my body at will more than the capacity or her mouth;

data.v: तस्याश्चास्यं महद्भीमं वर्धते मम भक्षणे । न च मां सा तु बुबुधे मम वा विकृतं कृतम् ।।
data.es: "She opened her huge mouth to eat me as she did not know that I had already assumed a huge ugly form on my own.
data.anv: तस्याः her, महत् huge, भीमम् fierce, आस्यं च mouth, मम भक्षणे to eat me, वर्धते increased, माम् myself, कृतम् did, मम my, विकृतम् ugly, साधु on my own, न बुबुधे not know.
data.md: And her huge and dreadful mouth extended wide to eat me up. She did not understand me, (Understand that I was able to assume any shape at pleasure) nor that I had altered my shape.

data.v: ततोऽहं विपुलं रूपं संक्षिप्य निमिषान्तरात् । तस्या हृदयमादाय प्रपतामि नभस्तलम् ।।
data.es: "In a moment I reduced from a huge form to a small one, entered her heart and sprang into the sky.
data.anv: ततः then, अहम् I, निमिषान्तरात् in a moment, विपुलम् vast, रूपम् form, संक्षिप्य reduced, तस्याः from her, हृदयम् heart, आदाय entered, नभस्थलम् into the sky, प्रपतामि  sprang up.
data.md: Then in the twinkling of an eye contracting my vasty shape, I, extracting her heart, darted into the sky.

data.v: सा विसृष्टभुजा भीमा पपात लवणाम्भसि । मया पर्वतसंकाशा निकृत्तहृदया सती ।।
data.es: "She who resembled a mountain fell into the ocean with her arms hanging down when I pulled out her heart.
data.anv: भीमा fierce, पर्वतसङ्काशा resembling mountain, सा she, मया my, निकृत्तहृदया pulled out her heart, सती she, विसृष्टभुजा hanging down her arms, लवणाम्भसि into the ocean, पपात fell.
data.md: Thereat, throwing about her arms, that terrific one dropped into the salt waters. On that chaste one, resembling a hill, having her heart torn, I heard the meet speech of magnanimous persons, who had come there of themselves, 'This dreadful Rākşasi, Sinhikā, has been swiftly slain by Hanumān.

data.v: शृणोमि खगतानां च सिद्धानां चारणैः सह । राक्षसी सिंहिका भीमा क्षिप्रं हनुमता हृता ।।
data.es: "I heard the charanas and siddhas residing in the sky talking to each other that the fierce ogres Simhika has been killed by Hanuman in a moment.
data.anv: चारणैः सह including charanas, खगतानाम् residing in the sky, सिद्धानाम् siddhas, भीमा fierce, राक्षसी ogres सिंहिका Simhika, क्षिप्रम् in a moment, हनुमता by Hanuman, हता slain, शृणोमि (talking to each other) I heard.

data.v: तां हत्वा पुनरेवाहं कृत्यमात्ययिकं स्मरन् । गत्वा च महदध्वानं पश्यामि नगमण्डितम् । दक्षिणं तीरमुदधेर्लङ्का यत्र च सा पुरी ।।
data.es: "Having slained Simhika, I thought of the huge feat that I have done. I remembered the big mission before me and went to the southern shore of the ocean and saw Lanka full of trees.
data.anv: अहम् I, ताम् her, हत्वा having slain, पुनरेव once again, अत्ययिकम् huge, कृत्यम् feat, स्मरन् remembered, महत् अध्वानम् huge mission, गत्वा went, यत्र there, सा that, लङ्कापुरी city of Lanka, उदधेः full of trees, दक्षिणं तीरम् southern shore, पश्यामि saw.
data.md: Having slain her, I again remembering the delay that had occurred touching my work, set out on the great road, and at length saw the southern shore of the sea, covered with mountains, where is situated the city of Lankā.

data.v: अस्तं दिनकरे याते रक्षसां निलयं पुरीम् । प्रविष्टोऽहमविज्ञातो रक्षोभिर्भीमविक्रमैः ।।
data.anv: दिनकरे Sun, अस्तं याते after setting, अहम् I, भीमविक्रमैः of fierce valour, रक्षोभिः guarded,   अविज्ञातः unnoticed, रक्षसाम् demons, निलयम् abode, पुरम् city, प्रविष्टः entered.
data.md: On the sun having set, I entered the city of the Raksasas-their home-unnoticed by the Rākṣasas of terrific vigour.

data.v: तत्राहं सर्वरात्रं तु विचिन्वञ्जनकात्मजाम् । रावणान्तःपुरगतो न चापश्यं सुमध्यमाम् ।।
data.es: "There when I went to the harem of Ravana and searched all night, I did not find the fairwaisted Janaka's daughter.
data.anv: अहम् I am, तत्र there, रावणान्तःपुरगतः Ravana's harem, सर्वरात्रम् all night, जनकात्मजाम् Janaka's daughter, विचिन्वन् searched also, सुमध्यमाम् fairwaisted lady, न अपश्यं च and not seen.
data.md: There I wandered all the night (seeking for Janaka's daughter) and (at length) entered Rāvana's inner apartment; but that one of a Deity waist I found not. And not finding Sītā in Ravana's abode, I was cast in a sea of sorrow; nor found I how to cross over it.

data.v: ततः सीतामपश्यंस्तु रावणस्य निवेशने । शोकसागरमासाद्य न पारमुपलक्षये ।।
data.es: "Not able to find Sita at the residence of Ravana I was immersed in an ocean of endless sorrow and did not know what to do.
data.anv: रावणस्य Ravana's, निवेशने residence, सीताम् Sita, अपश्यंस्तु not able to find, ततः then, शोकसागरम् ocean of sorrow, आसाद्य immersed, पारम् endless, न उपलक्षये did not know.

data.v: शोचता च मया दृष्टं प्राकारेण समावृतम् । काञ्चनेन विकृष्टेन गृहोपवनमुत्तमम् ।।
data.es: "While worrying like that I saw a long golden boundary wall surrounding a splendid home garden. (upabana)
data.anv: शोचता worrying so, मया by me, काञ्चनेन golden, विकृष्टेन long, प्राकारेण boundary wall, समावृतम् surrounding, उत्तमम् very splendid, गृहोपवनम् home garden, दृष्टम् seen.
data.md: As I was sorrowing, I saw as mansion with a charming grove encircled by a wall of excellent gold.

data.v: स प्राकारमवप्लुत्य पश्यामि बहुपादपम् ।।
data.md: And leaping over the wall, I saw a grove rife with trees; and (at last) saw in the midst of an aśoka wood a great ſinsapā.

data.v: अशोकवनिकामध्ये शिंशपापादपो महान् । तमारुह्य च पश्यामि काञ्चनं कदली वनम् ।।
data.es: "I crossed that boundary wall and saw many kinds of trees and in the midst of that Ashoka garden, a huge Simsupa tree. I ascended it and saw rows of banana plants.
data.anv: सः that, प्राकारम् boundary wall, अवप्लुत्य crossed, बहुपादपम् many kinds of trees, पश्यामि saw, अशोकवनिकामध्ये in the midst of Ashoka garden, महान् huge, शिंशुपापादपः Simsupa tree, तम् that, आरुह्य ascended, काञ्चनम् golden, कदलीवनम् rows of banana plants, पश्यामि saw.

data.v: अदूराच्छिंशपावृक्षात्पश्यामि वनवर्णिनीम् । श्यामां कमलपत्राक्षीमुपवासकृशाननाम् ।।
राक्षसीभिर्विरूपाभिः क्रूराभिरभिसंवृताम् । मांसशोणितभक्ष्याभिर्व्याघ्रीभिर्हरिणीं यथा ।।
तां दृष्ट्वा तादृशीं नारीं रामपत्नीमनिन्दिताम् । तत्रैव शिंशपावृक्षे पश्यन्नहमवस्थितः ।।
data.es: "I remained there looking on that renowned wife of Rama from the Simsupa tree.
data.anv: अहम् I am, तादृशीम् seeing her, नारीम् woman, यशस्विनीम् renowned one, तां रामपत्नीम् that Rama's wife, दृष्ट्वा on seeing, तत्र there, शिंशुपावृक्षे एव from the Simsupa tree only, पश्यन् saw, अवस्थितः stayed.
data.md: Seeing that lady the illustrious wife of Rāma in that condition, I seeing her remained even on that Sinsapa tree. Then I heard in Ravana's mansion loud and solemn sounds mixed with the tinklings of zones and bangles.

data.v: ततो हलहलाशब्दं काञ्चीनूपुरमिश्रितम् । शृणोम्यधिकगम्भीरं रावणस्य निवेशने ।।
data.es: "Then I heard a deep sound mixed with jingling golden girdles and anklets coming from Ravana's residence.
data.anv: ततः then, रावणस्य Ravana's, निवेशने residence, काञ्चीनूपुरमिश्रितम् sound of jingling bells of gold, अधिकगम्भीरम् very majestic, हलहलाशब्दम् making a loud noise, शृणोमि I heard.
data.md: Seeing that lady the illustrious wife of Rāma in that condition, I seeing her remained even on that Sinsapa tree. Then I heard in Ravana's mansion loud and solemn sounds mixed with the tinklings of zones and bangles.

data.v: ततोऽहं परमोद्विग्नः स्वरूपं प्रत्यसंहरम् । अहं च शिंशपावृक्षे पक्षीव गहने स्थितः ।।
data.es: "I was scared and contracted my body size and stood on the Simsupa tree like a bird in the sky.
data.anv: ततः then, अहम् I, परमोद्विग्नः very scared, स्वं रूपम् my form, प्रत्यसंहरम् contracted my body, अहं तु I also, गहने sky, शिंशुपावृक्षे in the Simsupa tree, पक्षीव like a bird, स्थितः stood.
data.md: Thereat exceedingly agitated, I changed my proper shape; and remained like a bird in a dark part of the Sinsapā tree.

data.v: ततो रावणदाराश्च रावणश्च महाबलः । तं देशं समनुप्राप्ता यत्र सीताभवत्स्थिता ।।
data.es: "Then arrived the powerful Ravana with his consorts to that place where Sita was and stood there.
data.anv: ततः then, रावणदाराश्च Ravana's consorts, महाबलः powerful, रावणश्च Ravana's, सीता Sita, यत्र there, स्थिता stood, अभवत् came, तम् to her, देशम् location, समनुप्राप्ताः reached.
data.md: Then the wives of Rāvana along with Rāvana himself of exceeding strength came to that place where Sītā was.

data.v: तं दृष्ट्वाथ वरारोहा सीता रक्षोगणेश्वरम् । संकुच्योरू स्तनौ पीनौ बाहुभ्यां परिरभ्य च ।।
data.es: "On seeing Ravana, the king of demons, beautiful Sita, full of fear hid her face and plump breasts between her thighs.
data.anv: अथ and then, वरारोहा beautiful one, सीता Sita, रक्षोगणेश्वरम् king of demon troops, तम् her, दृष्ट्वा seeing, ऊरू thighs, बाहुभ्याम् shoulders, सङ्कुच्य folded across, पीनौ plumpy, स्तनौ breasts, परिरभ्य च covered.
data.md: And seeing the lord of Rākşasas the exceedingly beauteous Sītā contracted her thighs and covered her full breasts with her arms.

data.v: तामुवाच दशग्रीवः सीतां परमदुःखिताम् । अवाक्शिराः प्रपतितो बहु मन्यस्व मामिति ।।
data.es: "Sita was full of fear and worry, looked here and there without any protector to pacify. She was trembling in fear. To that Sita, the tenheaded Ravana bent his head down and said, 'trust me and respect me'.
data.anv: वित्रस्ताम् full of fear, परमोद्विग्नाम् very much worried, ततस्ततः here and there, वीक्षमाणाम् looking, किञ्चित् not even one, त्राणम् protector, अपश्यन्तीम् not seen, वेपमानाम् trembling, तपस्विनीम् one in meditation, परमदुःखिताम् very sorrowful, तां सीताम् that Sita, दशग्रीवः tenheaded, अवाक्चिराः bending the head down, प्रतितः trust, माम् me, बहुमन्यस्व respect, इति this, उवाच spoke.
data.md: Seeing Sītā flurried and extremely excited and casting about her gladness up and down, not finding any relief and trembling forlorn, the Tennecked one said to her undergoing extreme anguish, “Without saying anything, I fall down (here). O fair one, do you regard me.”

data.v: यदि चेत्त्वं तु मां दर्पान्नाभिनन्दसि गर्विते । द्विमासानन्तरं सीते पास्यामि रुधिरं तव ।।
data.es: 'O Sita if in your pride, you do not respect me, I will see (drink) your blood in two months.
data.anv: गर्विते in your pride, सीते Sita, त्वम् your, दर्पात् with pride, माम् me, नाभिनन्दसि यदि चेत् if you do not respect me, द्वौ मासौ अन्तरम् in two months time, तव your, रुधिरम् blood, पास्यामि I will see.
data.md: If, O haughty one, you do not honour me from pride of heart, I shall, O Sītā, two months hence, see your blood.

data.v: एतच्छ्रुत्वा वचस्तस्य रावणस्य दुरात्मनः । उवाच परमक्रुद्धा सीता वचनमुत्तमम् ।।
data.es: "Hearing the words of evilminded Ravana, Sita became very angry and spoke these approprate words:
data.anv: दुरात्मनः evilminded one, तस्य your, रावणस्य Ravana's, एतत् all these, वचः words, श्रुत्वा hearing, सीता Sita, परमक्रुद्धा very angry, उत्तमम् good, वचनम् these words, उवाच spoke.
data.md: Hearing these words of the wicked Rāvana, Sītā, growing exceeding wroth, spoke these excellent words.

data.v: राक्षसाधम रामस्य भार्याममिततेजसः । इक्ष्वाकुकुलनाथस्य स्नुषां दशरथस्य च । अवाच्यं वदतो जिह्वा कथं न पतिता तव ।।
data.es: 'O lowly demon I am the wife of valiant Rama and daughterinlaw of Dasaratha, the king of Ikshvaku race. How is it your tongue that spoke unspeakable words has not fallen down?
data.anv: राक्षसाधम lowly rakshasa, अमिततेजसः highly valourous one, रामस्य Rama's, भार्याम् wife, इक्ष्वाकुकुलनाथस्य of the king of Ikshvaku race, दशरथस्य Dasaratha's, स्नुषां च daughterinlaw, अवाच्यम् unspeakable, वदतः words, तव your, जिह्वा tongue, कथम् how, न पतिता not fallen.
data.md: O worst of Rākşasas, having used improper speech towards the wife of Rāma of measureless prowess, and the daughter-in-law of Dasaratha, lord of the Ikşvāku line, why had you not your tongue fallen off?

data.v: किंस्विद्वीर्यं तवानार्य यो मां भर्तुरसंनिधौ । अपहृत्यागतः पाप तेनादृष्टो महात्मना ।।
data.es: 'O ignoble one when my husband was away, you came and abducted me unseen by the great Rama. You do not have even a little courage (to win me through a straight fight).
data.anv: नार्य ignoble, पाप sinner, यः such you, भर्तुः husband, असन्निधौ not near, माम् me, अपहृत्य abducted, महात्मना great, तेन by his, अदृष्टः without being seen, आगतः came, तव your, वीर्यम् courage, किञ्चित् not have little.
data.md: Fie upon the prowess of you that, O wretch, had carried me off while my husband was away; and not being seen of that high-souled one.

data.v: न त्वं रामस्य सदृशो दास्येऽप्यस्या न युज्यसे । यज्ञीयः सत्यवाक्चैव रणश्लाघी च राघवः ।।
data.es: 'You are not equal to Rama and not even fit to be his servant. He does yagnas and always abides in truth. He is valiant in war.
data.anv: त्वम् you, रामस्य Rama's, सदृशः not equal, न not, अस्य his, दास्येऽपि even of servant, न युज्यसे not fit to be, राघवः Rama, यज्ञीयः does yagnas, सत्यवादी always abides in truth, रणश्लाघी च and valiant in war.
data.md: You are never like Rama, you are not even fit to be his slave. Rāghava is invincible, truthful, heroic and (even) hungering for warfare.

data.v: जानक्या परुषं वाक्यमेवमुक्तो दशाननः । जज्वाल सहसा कोपाच्चितास्थ इव पावकः ।।
data.es: "Thus addressed harshly by Janaki, the tenheaded Ravana blazed up in anger suddenly like the flame of the funeral pyre.
data.anv: जानक्या by Janaki, एवम् in that way, परुषम् harsh, उक्तः spoken, दशाननः tenheaded one, सहसा suddenly, चितास्थः in the funeral pyre, पावकः इव like fire, कोपात् in anger, जज्वाल like flame.

data.v: विवृत्य नयने क्रूरे मुष्टिमुद्यम्य दक्षिणम् । मैथिलीं हन्तुमारब्धः स्त्रीभिर्हाहाकृतं तदा ।।
data.es: "Then the wicked Ravana raised his eyebrows and his right fist to strike at Sita and even the shedemon there raised their voice saying, ' alas, alas '
data.anv: क्रूरे wicked, नयने eyes, विवृत्य opened, दक्षिणम् right hand, मुष्टिम् fist, उद्यम्य raised, मैथिलीम् Mythili, हन्तुम् to kill, आरब्धः started, तदा then, स्त्रीभिः even the women there, हाहाकृतम् raised their voice saying, alas

data.v: स्त्रीणां मध्यात्समुत्पत्य तस्य भार्या दुरात्मनः । वरा मन्दोदरी नाम तया स प्रतिषेधितः ।।
data.es: "Evilminded Ravana's wife Mandodari, a noble one among women came forward from the midst and prevented him.
data.anv: दुरात्मनः evilminded, तस्य his, भार्या wife, मन्दोदरी नाम named Mandodari, वरा noble one, स्त्रीणाम् among women, मध्यात् from the midst, समुत्पत्य came, तया forward, सः he, प्रतिषेधितः objected.

data.v: उक्तश्च मधुरां वाणीं तया स मदनार्दितः । सीतया तव किं कार्यं महेन्द्रसमविक्रम । मया सह रमस्वाद्य मद्विशिष्टा न जानकी ।।
data.es: "She spoke sweetly to Ravana, who was tormented by the god of love saying, 'For what purpose do you desire Sita? You are equal to Mahendra in might'.
data.anv: मदनार्दितः  tormented by god of love, सः he, तया such, मधुराम् sweet, वाणीम् words, उक्तश्च having spoken, महेन्द्रसमविक्रमः equal to Mahendra in might, सीतया Sita, तव your, किं कार्यम् for what purpose.
data.md: O you that resemblest Indra the Great in prowess. Do you to-day sport with me. Janaki is not superior to me.

data.v: देवगन्धर्वकन्याभिर्यक्षकन्याभिरेव च । सार्धं प्रभो रमस्वेह सीतया किं करिष्यसि ।।
data.es: 'O lord you enjoy with the daughters of gods, gandharvas and even the young ladies of yakshas. Why do you need Sita?'
data.anv: प्रभो O Lord, देवगन्धर्वकन्याभिः even gods and  daughters of gandharvas, यक्षकन्याभिरेवच even young yaksha ladies, सार्धम् all, इह here, रमस्व enjoy, सीतया with Sita, किं करिष्यसि why do you need.
data.md: And, O lord, do you sport with the daughters of celestials and Gandharvas, and with the daughters themselves of Yakşas. What will you do with Sītā?

data.v: ततस्ताभिः समेताभिर्नारीभिः स महाबलः । उत्थाप्य सहसा नीतो भवनं स्वं निशाचरः ।।
data.es: "Then all the women got together and stopped the mighty nightranger, Ravana and quickly took him back to his mansion.
data.anv: ततः then, महाबलः mighty, सः निशाचरः nightwanderer, समेताभिः together, ताभिः नारीभिः all the women, प्रसाद्य  sprang up, सहसा quickly, स्वं भवनम् his mansion, नीतः took.
data.md: Then that exceedingly powerful ranger of the night was speedily raised up and taken (back) to his residence.

data.v: याते तस्मिन्दशग्रीवे राक्षस्यो विकृताननाः । सीतां निर्भर्त्सयामासुर्वाक्यैः क्रूरैः सुदारुणैः ।।
data.anv: तस्मिन् दशग्रीवे when that tenheaded one, याते went, विकृताननाः those uglyfaced ones, राक्षस्यः demons, क्रूरैः cruel, सुदारुणैः frightful, वाक्यैः words, सीताम् to Sita, निर्भर्त्सयामासुः threatened.
data.md: On the Ten-necked one having departed, the Rákşasis of fearful faces fell to railing at Sītā in cruel and rough words.

data.v: तृणवद्भाषितं तासां गणयामास जानकी । तर्जितं च तदा तासां सीतां प्राप्य निरर्थकम् ।।
data.es: "Janaki did not care for their words of threat, as though they were a blade of grass and of no use to her.
data.anv: जानकी Janaki, तासाम् those, भाषितम् words, तृणवत् like a blade of grass, गणयामास not cared, तदा then, तासाम् they, गर्जितम् frightened, सीताम् Sita, प्राप्य uttered, निरर्थकम् were of no use.
data.md: But Jänakī heeded their speech as a straw; and their fury was lost upon Sītā.

data.v: वृथागर्जितनिश्चेष्टा राक्षस्यः पिशिताशनाः । रावणाय शशंसुस्ताः सीताव्यवसितं महत् ।।
data.es: "Since the threatenings of the shedemons were of no use the ogresses who live on flesh and blood reported to Ravana about great Sita's formidable determination.
data.anv: पिशिताशनाः flesh eaters, ताः राक्षस्यः those demonesses, वृथागर्जितनिश्चेष्टाः since their threatenings were of no use, महत् great, तत् that, सीताद्यवसितम् Sita's determination was formidable, रावणाय to Ravana, शशंसुः reported.
data.md: Desisting from their unavailing railing, the flesh-feasting Rākṣasi imparted to Rivaņa the mighty intent of Sītā.

data.v: ततस्ताः सहिताः सर्वा विहताशा निरुद्यमाः । परिक्षिप्य समन्तात्तां निद्रावशमुपागताः ।।
data.es: "Then all of them gave up hope of their efforts and scattered around her, succumbed to sleep.
data.anv: ततः then, सर्वाः all, ताः those, सहिताः together, निहताशाः given up hope, निरुद्यमाः given up their efforts, ताम् they, समन्तात् all over, परिक्षिप्य scattered around, निद्रावशम् to sleep, उपागताः succumbed.
data.md: Then, they all failing in their hope and deprived of energy, and tired, caine under the sway of sleep.

data.v: तासु चैव प्रसुप्तासु सीता भर्तृहिते रता । विलप्य करुणं दीना प्रशुशोच सुदुःखिता ।।
data.anv: तासु them, प्रसुप्तासु after sleeping, भर्तृहिते wellwisher of the husband, रता one who remained, सीता Sita, दीना miserable, करुणम् pathetically, विलप्य crying, सुदुःखिता very sad, प्रशुशोच lamented.
data.md: And on their sleeping, Sītā intent on the welfare of her lord, lamenting piteously, in forlorn guise, and stricken with extreme sorrow, mourned profusely.

data.v: तां चाहं तादृशीं दृष्ट्वा सीताया दारुणां दशाम् । चिन्तयामास विश्रान्तो न च मे निर्वृतं मनः ।।
data.es: 'Looking at the city, unassailable even to gods and demons, Hanuman sighed again and again thinking:
data.anv: हनुमान् Hanuman, सुरासुरैः by gods and demons, दुराधर्षाम् unassailable, तादृशीम् such, ताम् that, पुरीम् city, दृष्ट्वा seeing, विनिश्चित्य sighing, मुहुर्मुहुः again and again, चिन्तयामास reflected.
data.md: Witnessing such a hard condition of Sītā I began to reflect; nor did my mind attain ease or freedom from thought. And I cast about for finding means of addressing Jānaki.

data.v: संभाषणार्थे च मया जानक्याश्चिन्तितो विधिः । इक्ष्वाकुकुलवंशस्तु ततो मम पुरस्कृतः ।।
data.es: "I thought of a strategy to enter into conversation with Janaki that is to praise the Ikshvaku race.
data.anv: मया I am, जानक्याः with Janaki, सम्भाषणार्थम् to enter into conversation, विधि strategy, चिन्तितः thought, ततः that, इक्ष्वाकूणाम् in Ikshvaku, वंशस्तु in the race, मम my, पुरस्कृतः to praise.

data.v: श्रुत्वा तु गदितां वाचं राजर्षिगणपूजिताम् । प्रत्यभाषत मां देवी बाष्पैः पिहितलोचना ।।
data.es: "The divine lady heard my enumeration, sanctifying the royal seers. She replied me, with her eyes blinded by tears:
data.anv: देवी the divine lady, राजर्षिगणपूजिताम् sanctified by the names of royal seers, गदिताम् enumerated, वाचम् words, श्रुत्वा heard, बाष्पैः tears, पिहितलोचना eyes blinded, माम् me, प्रत्यभाषत replied.
data.md: I began by extolling the Ikşvāku race. Hearing the words that I uttered, embellished with descriptions of the virtues of Rajarşis, that exalted lady replied with her eyes covered with tears.

data.v: कस्त्वं केन कथं चेह प्राप्तो वानरपुंगव । का च रामेण ते प्रीतिस्तन्मे शंसितुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: "O foremost of vanaras who are you? Why and how have you come here? How did you make friendship with Rama? Tell me all that in detail.
data.anv: वानरपुङ्गव foremost of vanaras, त्वम् you, कः who, केन why, कथम् how, इह here, प्राप्तः could come, ते to you, रामेण with Rama, प्रीतिः friendship, का tell, तत् that, मे to me, शंसितुम् in detail, अर्हसि it is prpoer.
data.md: Who are you? And how had you, O foremost of monkeys, found they way here? And what is your delight in Rāma? This it behove you to relate to me.

data.v: तस्यास्तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा अहमप्यब्रुवं वचः । देवि रामस्य भर्तुस्ते सहायो भीमविक्रमः । सुग्रीवो नाम विक्रान्तो वानरेन्दो महाबलः ।।
data.es: "Hearing her I also said, 'O queen Sugriva, the warrior of fierce valour and king of monkeys developed friendship with your husband'.
data.anv: तस्याः तत् her those, वचनम् words, श्रुत्वा hearing, अहमपि I also, वचः these words, अब्रुवम् spoke, देवि O queen, ते to your, भर्तुः husband, सहायः help, महाबलः mighty, भीमविक्रमः fierce valour, सुग्रीवो नाम named Sugriva, विक्रान्तः warrior, वानरेन्द्रः king of monkeys.
data.md: Hearing her speech, I too said, O revered one, your husband, Rāma, has found a helpmate in a one endowed with terrific strength, named Sugrīva— redoubtable, the highly powerful lord of the monkeys.

data.v: तस्य मां विद्धि भृत्यं त्वं हनूमन्तमिहागतम् । भर्त्राहं प्रहितस्तुभ्यं रामेणाक्लिष्टकर्मणा ।।
data.es: 'I came here as a servant sent by your tireless husband to find you.
data.anv: इह here, आगतम् I came, माम् me, तस्य his, भृत्यम् servant, त्वम् you, विद्धि to find, अहम् I, भर्त्रा by your husband, अक्लिष्टकर्मणा tireless in action, रामेण by Rama, तुभ्यम् for your sake, प्रेषितः sent me.
data.md: Do you know me as Hanumăn his servant despatched here by your spouse-Räma of unwearied actions.

data.v: इदं च पुरुषव्याघ्रः श्रीमान्दाशरथिः स्वयम् । अङ्गुलीयमभिज्ञानमदात्तुभ्यं यशस्विनि ।।
data.es: 'O glorious lady the tiger among men, the illustrious son of Dasaratha himself sent this ring to you as a taken of identity.
data.anv: यशस्विनि O glorious lady, पुरुषव्याघ्रः tiger among men, श्रीमान् illustrious, दाशरथिः Dasaratha's son, स्वयम् himself, इदम् this, अङ्गुलीयम् this ring, तुभ्यम् to you, अभिज्ञानम् to recognise, अदात् sent.
data.md: O famed damsel, that highly effulgent son of Dasaratha-the foremost of men, has sent as a token this ring.

data.v: तदिच्छामि त्वयाज्ञप्तं देवि किं करवाण्यहम् । रामलक्ष्मणयोः पार्श्वं नयामि त्वां किमुत्तरम् ।।
data.es: 'O venerable lady I seek your order. What should I do? Should I take you to Rama and Lakshmana? What do you say?
data.anv: देवि O venerable lady, तत् that, त्वया by your, आज्ञप्तम् order, इच्छामि wish to know, अहम् I, किम् what, करवाणि to do, त्वाम् you, रामलक्ष्मणयोः both Rama and Lakshmana, पार्श्वम् to them, नयामि take you, उत्तरम् back, किम् what do you say?
data.md: I desire to know, O worshipful dame, what behest of yours may I obey now. Shall I carry you to Rāma and Lakşmaņa on the northern shore of the Ocean?”

data.v: एतच्छ्रुत्वा विदित्वा च सीता जनकनन्दिनी । आह रावणमुत्साद्य राघवो मां नयत्विति ।।
data.es: "Having heard all that (Hanuman said) Sita, the delight of Janaka thought over and said, 'Rama should kill Ravana and take me'.
data.anv: जनकनन्दिनी delight of Janaka, सीता Sita, एतत् all this, श्रुत्वा having heard, विदित्त्वा च thought over, राघवः Rama, रावणम् Ravana, उत्साद्य slaying, माम् me, नयतु should take, इति this, आह she said.
data.md: Hearing this and revolving within herself Sītā, Janaka's daughter, replied.-Discomfiting Rāvaņa, may Rāghava himself carry me hence,' And bowing my head to that worshipful and blameless dame, I wanted of her a token as might conduce to Rāghava's pleasure.

data.v: प्रणम्य शिरसा देवीमहमार्यामनिन्दिताम् । राघवस्य मनोह्लादमभिज्ञानमयाचिषम् ।।
data.es: "Then bowing down I saluted the noble and blameless queen Sita to give a signet, which would be very pleasing to Rama.
data.anv: अहम् I am, आर्याम् noble, अनिन्दिताम् flawless, देवीम् queen, शिरसा bowing, प्रणम्य saluted, राघवस्य to Rama, मनोह्लादम् very pleasing to his mind, अभिज्ञानम् to recognise, अयाचिषम् signet.
data.md: Hearing this and revolving within herself Sītā, Janaka's daughter, replied.-Discomfiting Rāvaņa, may Rāghava himself carry me hence,' And bowing my head to that worshipful and blameless dame, I wanted of her a token as might conduce to Rāghava's pleasure.

data.v: एवमुक्ता वरारोहा मणिप्रवरमुत्तमम् । प्रायच्छत्परमोद्विग्ना वाचा मां संदिदेश ह ।।
data.es: "Having said so, the noble lady delivered a wonderful jewel with supreme message to me in a sorrowful mood.
data.anv: वरारोहा fairhipped lady, इति thus, उक्त्वा having delivered, अद्भुतम् wonderful, मणिप्रवरम् excellent jewel, प्रायच्छत् gave, परमोद्विग्ना in an anxious state, माम् me, वाचा spoke, सन्दिदेश ह message.
data.md: Having said this, that best of fair ones gave me the excellent jewel, and wrought up with anxiety, related to me the story of crow (for Rāma's information).

data.v: ततस्तस्यै प्रणम्याहं राजपुत्र्यै समाहितः । प्रदक्षिणं परिक्राममिहाभ्युद्गतमानसः ।।
data.es: "Reminded by her again (that Rama should turn up soon to take her), I offered reverential salutations by circumambulating her.
data.anv: ततः then, अहम् I, तस्यै her, राजपुत्र्यै princess, प्रणम्य saluted, समाहितः with focused mind, इह here, अभ्युद्गतमानसः should come soon, प्रदक्षिणम् circumambulated, परिक्रामम् went round.
data.md: Thereupon bent on returning here I, with a fixed mind, circumambulated and bowed to that worshipful dame.

data.v: उत्तरं पुनरेवाह निश्चित्य मनसा तदा । हनूमन्मम वृत्तान्तं वक्तुमर्हसि राघवे ।।
data.anv: अहम् I, तया to her, मनसा in mind, निश्चित्य determined, पुनरेव again, उक्तः said, हनुमान् Hanuman, राघवे to Rama, मम my, वृत्तान्तम् all about my story, वक्तुम् you tell, अर्हसि I wish.
data.md: And revolving within herself she again replied 'Hanumān, do you relate this to Rāghava in such a wise that the heroes Rāma and Lakşmaņa, along with Sugrīva might instantly come here.

data.v: यथा श्रुत्वैव नचिरात्तावुभौ रामलक्ष्मणौ । सुग्रीवसहितौ वीरावुपेयातां तथा कुरु ।।
data.es: 'O heroic Hanuman narrate in such a way that by hearing you both Rama and Lakshmana will come here soon, accompanied by Sugriva.
data.anv: वीरौ heroic one, तौ they both, रामलक्ष्मणौ Rama and Lakshmana, उभौ both, श्रुत्वैव on hearing, सुग्रीवसहितौ accompanied by Sugriva, न चिरात् not very late, यथा that way, उपेयाताम् coming here, तथा that way, कुरु you may do.
data.md: And revolving within herself she again replied 'Hanumān, do you relate this to Rāghava in such a wise that the heroes Rāma and Lakşmaņa, along with Sugrīva might instantly come here.

data.v: यद्यन्यथा भवेदेतद्द्वौ मासौ जीवितं मम । न मां द्रक्ष्यति काकुत्स्थो म्रिये साहमनाथवत् ।।
data.es: 'Otherwise with none to protect me, I will live only for two months.I will die like an orphan and he will not see me'.
data.anv: अन्यथा otherwise, भवेद्यदि with none to protect, मम I, जीवितम् life, द्वौ two, मासौ months only, काकुत्स्थ to Rama, माम् me, न द्रक्ष्यति not see, सा अहम् that I, अनाथवत् like an orphan, म्रिये will die.
data.md: Or else there remain two months more of my me. Rāghava shall not see me and I shall quit my life like one having no husband.

data.v: तच्छ्रुत्वा करुणं वाक्यं क्रोधो मामभ्यवर्तत । उत्तरं च मया दृष्टं कार्यशेषमनन्तरम् ।।
data.es: "When I heard her pathetic appeal, I was overtaken by anger. I perceived the task left over for me to do.
data.anv: करुणम् pathetic, तत् these, वाक्यम् words, श्रुत्वा having heard, माम् me, क्रोधः anger, अभ्यवर्तत overtaken, उत्तरम् reply, अनन्तरम् after that, कार्यशेषम् left over task, मया by me, दृष्टम् perceived.
data.md: Hearing those piteous accents I was worked up with ire and at once resolved upon destroying the city of Lankā.

data.v: ततोऽवर्धत मे कायस्तदा पर्वतसंनिभः । युद्धकाङ्क्षी वनं तच्च विनाशयितुमारभे ।।
data.es: "Thereafter, I increased my body to the size of a mountain, intent on fighting and started destroying the pleasure garden.
data.anv: ततः that, तदा then, मे I, कायः body, पर्वतसन्निभः like a mountain, अवर्धत increased, युद्धकाङ्क्षी intent on fighting, तत् that, वनम् garden, विनाशयितुम् to destroy, आरभे started.
data.md: Thereupon my body increased like to a mountain and desirous of entering into conflict I began to lay waste the forest.

data.v: तद्भग्नं वनषण्डं तु भ्रान्तत्रस्तमृगद्विजम् । प्रतिबुद्धा निरीक्षन्ते राक्षस्यो विकृताननाः ।।
data.es: "Those uglyfaced ogresses woke up and saw the devastated garden and terrified beasts and birds.
data.anv: विकृताननाः uglyfaced, राक्षस्यः ogresses, प्रतिबुद्धाः woke up and saw, भग्नम् broken, भ्रान्तत्रस्तमृगद्विजम् terrified birds and beasts, तत् that, वनषण्डम् destroyed garden, निरीक्षन्ते saw.
data.md: The whole forest was devastated the birds and deer strayed away in fear and the Rākşasīs, having terrible faces, awaking, beheld all that.

data.v: मां च दृष्ट्वा वने तस्मिन्समागम्य ततस्ततः । ताः समभ्यागताः क्षिप्रं रावणायाचचक्षिरे ।।
data.anv: ततस्ततः here and there, समागम्य collecting together, तस्मिन् वने in that garden, माम् me, दृष्ट्वा saw, ताः them, क्षिप्रम् at once, समभ्यागताः understood, रावणाय to Ravana, आचचक्षिरे thus reported.
data.md: And beholding me in the forest, they all, gathering, instantly conveyed the message to Ravana.

data.v: राजन्वनमिदं दुर्गं तव भग्नं दुरात्मना । वानरेण ह्यविज्ञाय तव वीर्यं महाबल ।।
data.es: 'O powerful king an evilminded vanara has destroyed the inaccessible pleasure garden not knowing your valour.
data.anv: महाबल powerful, राजन् king, दुरात्मना evilminded, वानरेण by a vanara, तव your, वीर्यम् valour, अविज्ञाय not knowing, दुर्गम् inaccessible, तव your, इदं वनम् this garden, भग्नम् destroyed.
data.md: O king, O you of mighty prowess, this your forest and castle has been broken down by the vicious-souled monkey not knowing your strength.

data.v: दुर्बुद्धेस्तस्य राजेन्द्र तव विप्रियकारिणः । वधमाज्ञापय क्षिप्रं यथासौ विलयं व्रजेत् ।।
data.es: 'O king may orders be issued to kill this wickedminded vanara wandering aimlessly. He has done contrary to your interest.
data.anv: राजेन्द्र O king, असौ यथा this, विलयम् aimlessly, व्रजेत् wanderer, तव your, विप्रियकारिणः who has done contrary to your interest, दुर्बुध्देः wickedminded, तस्य his, वधम् to kill, क्षिप्रम् immediately, आज्ञापय order.
data.md: O king, he has been impelled by his vicious sense, to do they mischief. Do you order for his head so that he might not return.

data.v: तच्छ्रुत्वा राक्षसेन्द्रेण विसृष्टा भृशदुर्जयाः । राक्षसाः किंकरा नाम रावणस्य मनोऽनुगाः ।।
data.es: "Ravana, lord of the demons having heard (the ogresses) sent invincible ogres called kinkaras who know his mind.
data.anv: तत् that, श्रुत्वा having heard, राक्षसेन्द्रेण by the lord of demons, भृशदुर्जयाः who are invincible, रावणस्य Ravana's, मनोनुगाः those who know his mind, किङ्करा नाम called kinkara, राक्षसाः demon, विसृष्टाः sent.
data.md: Hearing this the lord of the Rākşasas despatched a chosen band of demons named Kinkaras. (Literally it means servants—hero it means his own personal attendants who were brave and heroic.)

data.v: तेषामशीतिसाहस्रं शूलमुद्गरपाणिनाम् । मया तस्मिन्वनोद्देशे परिघेण निषूदितम् ।।
data.es: "I killed with an iron bar a battalion of eighty thousand demons who were guarding the garden with tridents and maces.
data.anv: तस्मिन् those, वनोद्धेशे near the garden, शूलमुद्गरपाणिनाम् tridents and maces, तेषाम् with them, अशीतिसाहस्रम् battalion of eighty thousand (demons), मया by me, परिघेण by iron bar, निषूदितम् killed.
data.md: I despatched with my inace in no time eighty thousand of them no sooner than they entered the forest with darts and maces.

data.v: तेषां तु हतशेषा ये ते गता लघुविक्रमाः । निहतं च मया सैन्यं रावणायाचचक्षिरे ।।
data.es: "Those who were left behind, the less powerful ones went and reported to Ravana that the great army has been killed.
data.anv: तेषाम् them, ये who were, हतशेषाः left behind, ते they, लघुविक्रमाः less powerful, गत्वा went, महत् great, सैन्यम् army, निहतम् killed, रावणाय to Ravana, आचचक्षिरे reported.
data.md: And the few, who were saved, proceeded very quickly to Rāvana and related to him the destruction of the soldiers by me.

data.v: ततो मे बुद्धिरुत्पन्ना चैत्यप्रासादमाक्रमम् ।।
तत्रस्थान्राक्षसान्हत्वा शतं स्तम्भेन वै पुनः । ललाम भूतो लङ्काया मया विध्वंसितो रुषा ।।
data.es: "Then a thought struck my mind. I took hold of a pillar of the tall, decorated mansion of Lanka and killed with it all the hundred demons stationed there.
