data.anv: ततः then, मे I, बुद्धिः intellect, उत्पन्ना arose, चैत्यप्रासादम् high rise mansion, आक्रमम् taking hold, स्तम्भेन with a pillar, तत्रस्थान् stationed there, शतम् a hundred, राक्षसान् demons, हत्वा killed, पुनः again, मया by me, लङ्कायाः in Lanka, ललामभूतः a decorative mansion, सः that, विध्वंसितः destroyed.
data.md: Thereupon I thought of destroying the Caitya (A place of sacrifice or religious worship) palace and destroyed with the pillar, all the Rākşasas stationed there. Excited with wrath I destroyed that palace the best in the whole city of Lanka.

data.v: ततः प्रहस्तस्य सुतं जम्बुमालिनमादिशत् ।।
data.anv: ततः then, घोररूपैः of terrific appearance, भयानकैः frightening, बहुभिः many, राक्षसैः ogres, सार्धम् together with, प्रहस्तस्य Prahasta's, सुतम् son, जम्बुमालिनम् Jambumali, आदिशत् ordered
data.md: Thereupon (Rāvana) despatched Jambumāli, the son of Prahasta.

data.v: तमहं बलसंपन्नं राक्षसं रणकोविदम् । परिघेणातिघोरेण सूदयामि सहानुगम् ।।
data.es: "With a dreadful iron bar I slayed Jambumali, who was endowed with mighty strength, and was an expert in war and other terrific ogres who accompanied him.
data.anv: महाबलसम्पन्नम् endowed with mighty strength, रणकोविदम् expert in war, सहानुगम् and others who accompanied, तं राक्षसम् the demons, घोरेण by a terrific, परिघेण with iron bar, सूदयामि slayed.
data.md: With my fierce mace I destroyed that mighty Rākşasa, versed in the art of war, along with his retinue and surrounded by a band of terrible and grim-visaged demons.

data.v: तच्छ्रुत्वा राक्षसेन्द्रस्तु मन्त्रिपुत्रान्महाबलान् । पदातिबलसंपन्नान्प्रेषयामास रावणः । परिघेणैव तान्सर्वान्नयामि यमसादनम् ।।
data.es: "Ravana, the demon king sent his mighty army of strong footsoldiers, the sons of ministers.
data.anv: राक्षसेन्द्रः demon king, रावणः Ravana, महाबलान् mighty army, पदातिबलसम्पन्नान् strong footsoldiers, मन्त्रिपुत्रान् sons of ministers, प्रेषयामास sent.
data.md: Hearing this, Ravana, the lord of Raksasas sent the highly powerful sons of the ministers followed by a regiment of infantry. But I despatched them to the abode of Death by means of my dart.

data.v: मन्त्रिपुत्रान्हताञ्श्रुत्वा समरे लघुविक्रमान् । पञ्चसेनाग्रगाञ्शूरान्प्रेषयामास रावणः । तानहं सह सैन्यान्वै सर्वानेवाभ्यसूदयम् ।।
data.es: "I sent all of them to the abode of Yama with just an iron bar. Having heard about the death of the less powerful ones, Ravana sent five heroic army generals.
data.anv: तान् सर्वान् all of them, परिघेणैव with iron bar only, यमसादनम् the abode of Yama, नयामि sent, रावणः Ravana, समरे in combat, लघुविक्रमान् less valiant, मन्त्रिपुत्रान् sons of ministers, हतान् having been killed, श्रुत्वा heard, शूरान् heroes, पञ्च five, सेनाग्रगान् army generals, प्रेषयामास sent.
data.md: Hearing of the destruction in battle of the ministers' sons of feeble prowess Rāvana sent five heroic commanders,

data.v: ततः पुनर्दशग्रीवः पुत्रमक्षं महाबलम् । बहुभी राकसैः सार्धं प्रेषयामास संयुगे ।।
data.es: "Since I killed all of them along with the army, the tenheaded Ravana sent out his mighty son Aksha together with many demons.
data.anv: अहम् I, सहसैन्यान् along with the army, तान् सर्वान् all of them, अभ्यसूदयम् having been killed, ततः then, दशग्रीवः tenheaded, रावणः Ravana, महाबलम् mighty, पुत्रम् son, अक्षम् Aksha, बहुभिः and many, राक्षसैः demons, सार्धम् together with, प्रेषयामास sent out.
data.md: But I slew all of them along with their hosts. Thereupon the Ten necked demon sent his highly powerful son Aksa in the battle followed by a number of Rākşasas.

data.v: तं तु मन्दोदरी पुत्रं कुमारं रणपण्डितम् । सहसा खं समुत्क्रान्तं पादयोश्च गृहीतवान् । चर्मासिनं शतगुणं भ्रामयित्वा व्यपेषयम् ।।
data.es: "When Mandodari's son, an expert in war had risen up to the sky I caught his feet and whirled him round a hundred times and smashed him.
data.anv: रणपण्डितम् expert in war, मन्दोदरीपुत्त्रम् Mandodari's son, खम् to the sky, उत्क्रान्तम् risen up, चर्मासिनम् feet, तं कुमारम् of that young man, सहसा at once, पादयोः both feet, गृहीतवान् caught hold of, शतगुणम् hundred times, भ्रामयित्वा whirled him round, व्यवेषयम् smashed.
data.md: No sooner the princely son of Mandodarī, versed in the art of war, rose high up in the welkin than I got hold of his legs and whirling him for hundred times ground him to the dust.

data.v: तमक्षमागतं भग्नं निशम्य स दशाननः । तत इन्द्रजितं नाम द्वितीयं रावणः सुतम् । व्यादिदेश सुसंक्रुद्धो बलिनं युद्धदुर्मदम् ।।
data.es: "When Aksha was done to death, the tenfaced Ravana was enraged and gave instruction to the second son, called Indrajit who was thirsting for war.
data.anv: दशाननः tenfaced, सः रावणः that Ravana, आगतम् gone, अक्षम् of Aksha, भग्नम् destroyed, निशम्य after hearing, सुसंकृद्धः became very angry, ततः then, बलिनम् strong, युद्धदुर्मदम् thirsting for war, इन्द्रजितं नाम named Indrajit, द्वितीयम् second, सुतम् son, व्यादिदेश gave instruction.
data.md: Hearing of the discomfiture of Aksa, Ravana, exercised with ire sent his second son, the highly a rope and powerful Indrajit incapable of being repressed in battle.

data.v: तस्याप्यहं बलं सर्वं तं च राक्षसपुंगवम् । नष्टौजसं रणे कृत्वा परं हर्षमुपागमम् ।।
data.es: "When the army and even the Generals were done to death in combat I was very happy.
data.anv: अहम् I, सर्वम् all, तत् that, बलं च even army, तम् them, राक्षसपुङ्गवं च even the army chiefs, रणे in combat, नष्टौजसम् having been destroyed, कृत्वा done, परम् very, हर्षम् happy, उपागमम् became.
data.md: And discomfiting that best of Rākşasas, with his host I attained to an excess of delight.

data.v: महता हि महाबाहुः प्रत्ययेन महाबलः । प्रेषितो रावणेनैष सह वीरैर्मदोत्कटैः ।।
data.es: "Thinking that Indrajit will surely kill me, the strongarmed mighty Ravana again sent intoxicated demon warriors.
data.anv: महाबाहुः strongarmed, महाबलः mighty, मदोत्कटैः intoxicated, वीरैः सह including the warriors, रावणेनैव Ravana's confidence, महता great, प्रत्ययेन again,प्रेषितः sent.
data.md: That hero of great prowess and mighty-arms with a number of other proud heroes was despatched by Rāvana in great confidence.

data.v: ब्राह्मेणास्त्रेण स तु मां प्रबध्नाच्चातिवेगतः । रज्जूभिरभिबध्नन्ति ततो मां तत्र राक्षसाः ।।
data.md: Beholding my unbearable prowess and his own soldiers slain, speedily he went away fettering me with his Brahma weapon. Thereat the other Rākşasas bound me up with carried me to Rāvana.

data.v: रावणस्य समीपं च गृहीत्वा मामुपानयन् । दृष्ट्वा संभाषितश्चाहं रावणेन दुरात्मना ।।
data.md: Thereupon I was welcomed by the vicioussouled Rāvana and was asked why I did come to Lankă and slay the Rākşasas. Whereto I replied, "I have done all this for Sītā."

data.v: पृष्टश्च लङ्कागमनं राक्षसानां च तद्वधम् । तत्सर्वं च मया तत्र सीतार्थमिति जल्पितम् ।।
अस्याहं दर्शनाकाङ्क्षी प्राप्तस्त्वद्भवनं विभो । मारुतस्यौरसः पुत्रो वानरो हनुमानहम् ।।
data.es: 'I have done all this for the sake of Sita, O demon king I came to your mansion desiring to see Sita. I am the legitimate son of Windgod. My name is Hanuman.
data.anv: तत् that, सर्वम् entire, सीतार्थमिति for Sita's sake, मया I am, तत्र there, जल्पितम् burnt, विभो O king, अस्याः your, दर्शनकाङ्क्षी desiring to see her, त्वद्भवनम् your mansion, प्राप्तः reached, अहम् I, मारुतस्य Windgod's, औरसः पुत्रः legitimate son, वानरः vanara, हनुमान् Hanuman.
data.md: To behold her I have come here, O hero. I am the monkey Hanumān, the own begotten son of Māruta. Do you know me as Rāma's ambassador and the minister of Sugrīva. And on Rāma's embassy have I come here before you.

data.v: रामदूतं च मां विद्धि सुग्रीवसचिवं कपिम् । सोऽहं दौत्येन रामस्य त्वत्समीपमिहागतः ।।
data.es: 'I am a vanara, a messenger of Rama and minister of Sugriva.You may know that I have come here to convey the message of Rama to you.
data.anv: कपिम् I am a vanara, माम् I am, रामदूतम् messenger of Rama, सुग्रीवसचिवम् minister of Sugriva, विद्धि you may know, सः अहम् that I, रामस्य Rama's, दूत्येन as messenger, त्वत्सकाशम् to convey that message, इह here, आगतः came.
data.md: To behold her I have come here, O hero. I am the monkey Hanumān, the own begotten son of Māruta. Do you know me as Rāma's ambassador and the minister of Sugrīva. And on Rāma's embassy have I come here before you.

data.v: शृणु चापि समादेशं यदहं प्रब्रवीमि ते । राक्षसेश हरीशस्त्वां वाक्यमाह समाहितम् । धर्मार्थकामसहितं हितं पथ्यमिवाशनम् ।।
data.md: Do you hear of my mission-I do relate to you, O lord of Räkşasas, the message which the monkey chief has commanded me to communicate to you.

data.v: वसतो ऋष्यमूके मे पर्वते विपुलद्रुमे । राघवो रणविक्रान्तो मित्रत्वं समुपागतः ।।
data.es: 'While I was dwelling at the woodedmountain in Rshyamuka, a treaty of friendship was made with Rama, who is skilled in war.
data.anv: विपुलद्रुमे filled with plenty of trees, ऋश्यमूके Rshyamuka, वसतः dwelling, मे I, रणविक्रान्तः skilled in war, राघवः Rama, मित्त्रत्वम् friendship, उपागतः was made.
data.md: While I lived on the mount Rşyamūka covered with huge trees I made friends with Rāghava dreadful in conflict.

data.v: तेन मे कथितं राजन्भार्या मे रक्षसा हृता । तत्र साहाय्यहेतोर्मे समयं कर्तुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: 'The king said, ' My wife was abducted by a demon. I request your help by all means to get her'.
data.anv: राज्ञा the king, तेन by him, मे to me, कथितम् revealed, मे भार्या my wife, रक्षसा by the demon, हृता abducted, तत्र there, त्वया by your, सर्वात्मना by all ways, अस्माकम् by you, साहाय्यम् help, कार्यम् do.
data.md: He has spoken to me, O king, ‘My spouse has been taken away by a Rākşasa. It behove you to promise me your help in this.'

data.v: वालिना हृतराज्येन सुग्रीवेण सह प्रभुः । चक्रेऽग्निसाक्षिकं सक्यं राघवः सहलक्ष्मणः ।।
data.es: With fire as witness the great lord, Rama along with Lakshmana made friendship with Sugriva whose kingdom had been usurped.
data.anv: महाप्रभुः that great lord, सह लक्ष्मणः accompanied by Lakshmana, राघवः Rama, वालिना Vali, हृतराज्येन kingdom usurped, सुग्रीवेण by Sugriva, अग्निसाक्षिकम् in the presence of fire as witness, सख्यम् ally, चक्रे made.
data.md: And in the presence of fire, Rāma, along wi Lakşmaņa, contracted friendship with me who had been deprived of his kingdom by Vāli.

data.v: तेन वालिनमुत्साद्य शरेणैकेन संयुगे । वानराणां महाराजः कृतः संप्लवतां प्रभुः ।।
data.es: 'In the combat Rama killed Vali with a single arrow and made Sugriva the king of vanaras.
data.anv: तेन and then, संयुगे in the combat, एकेन with a single, शरेण arrow, वालिनम् Vali, उत्पाट्य slayed, प्लवताम् for vanaras, प्रभुः king, सः he, वानराणाम् vanaras, महाराजः lord, कृतः did.
data.md: And he has made me lord over all the monkeys after slaying Vāli in conflict with a single shaft.

data.v: तस्य साहाय्यमस्माभिः कार्यं सर्वात्मना त्विह । तेन प्रस्थापितस्तुभ्यं समीपमिह धर्मतः ।।
data.es: 'We too have to help him in this task. So a message is sent to you on righteous grounds.
data.anv: इह here, अस्माभिः we also, सर्वात्मना all of us, तस्य to him, सहाय्यम् help, कार्यम् in this task, तेन so, तुभ्यम् surely, समीपम् to you, धर्मतः righteously, प्रस्थापितः sent to convey the message.
data.md: It therefore behove us to assist him by all means. And by virtue of this contract I have despatched Hanumān to you as an envoy.

data.v: क्षिप्रमानीयतां सीता दीयतां राघवस्य च । यावन्न हरयो वीरा विधमन्ति बलं तव ।।
data.es: 'Before the heroic vanaras exterminate your entire army, return Sita at once to Rama.
data.anv: वीराः heroic, हरयः vanaras, तव your, बलम् army, यावत् entire, न विधमन्ति before exterminating your army, सीता Sita, क्षिप्रम् at once, आनीयताम् get, राघवाय to Rama, दीयतां च you may give.
data.md: Do you therefore speedily bring back Sīta and return her to Rāghava before the heroic monkeys discomfit you.

data.v: वानराणां प्रभवो हि न केन विदितः पुरा । देवतानां सकाशं च ये गच्छन्ति निमन्त्रिताः ।।
data.es: 'Who knows not the power of Vanaras in the past? Even gods had sought their help.
data.anv: ये who, निमन्त्रिताः summoned to, देवतानाम् even devatas, सङ्काशम् for the help, गच्छन्ति पुरा earlier, वानराणाम् by the vanaras, प्रभावः power, केन who, न विदितः does not know.
data.md: Who know not the prowess of the monkeys who in the days of yore used to visit the celestials invited?

data.v: इति वानरराजस्त्वामाहेत्यभिहितो मया । मामैक्षत ततो रुष्टश्चक्षुषा प्रदहन्निव ।।
data.es: 'This I was asked to tell you by the king of vanaras wishing your welfare'. 'Ravana then angrily looked at me as if to burn me.
data.anv: इति this, वानरराजः king of vanaras, त्वाम् to you, आह to tell, इति this, मया my, अभिहितः wishing your welfare, ततः that, क्रुद्धः angrily, चक्षुषा eyes, प्रदहन्निव as if to burn, माम् at me, ऐक्षत looked.
data.md: With these words the king of the monkeys has despatched me to you. And thereupon he eyed me as if burning me with the looks of his angry eyes.

data.v: तेन वध्योऽहमाज्ञप्तो रक्षसा रौद्रकर्मणा ।।
data.es: "The evilminded demon, Ravana, who perpetrates dreadful acts ordered my slaughter, not knowing my power.
data.anv: रौद्रकर्मणा one who performs dreadful actions, रक्षसा by the demon, दुरात्मना evilminded one, तेन रावणेन by that Ravana, मत्प्रभावम् my power, अविज्ञाय not knowing, अहम् I, वध्यः to kill, आज्ञप्तः ordered.
data.md: And the vicious-souled demon-Rāvana, of terrible deeds, ordered for my destruction, not knowing my prowess.

data.v: ततो विभीषणो नाम तस्य भ्राता महामतिः । तेन राक्षसराजोऽसौ याचितो मम कारणात् ।।
data.es: "Vibhisana, a very pious brother of the demon king, interceded on my behalf.
data.anv: विभीषणो नाम named Vibhishana, महामतिः very pious, तस्य his, भ्राता brother, ततः then, तेन him, असौ was there, राक्षसराजः demon king, मम कारणात् on account of me, याचितः  solicited.
data.md: thereupon Vibhīşaņa, the high-souled brother of that lord of the Räkşasas interceded on my behalf in the following strain

data.v: दूतवध्या न दृष्टा हि राजशास्त्रेषु राक्षस । दूतेन वेदितव्यं च यथार्थं हितवादिना ।।
data.es: 'The royal code prohibits the murder of an emissary. A wellwishing emissary should convey the truth.
data.anv: राक्षस demon, राजशास्त्रेषु by the royal code, दूतवध्या killing of emissary, न दृष्टा हि not seen indeed, हितवादिना wellwisher, दूतेन messenger, यथार्थम् truth, वेदितव्यम् has to convey.
data.md: The destruction of an envoy is not sanctioned by the royal morality, O Raksasa. They communicate simply the mandate of their masters.

data.v: सुमहत्यपराधेऽपि दूतस्यातुलविक्रमः । विरूपकरणं दृष्टं न वधोऽस्तीह शास्त्रतः ।।
data.es: 'O Ravana of immeasurable courage even if the emissary has done any kind of harm he may be mutilated but not murdered. Nowhere do the sastras allow killing (of an ambassador).
data.anv: अतुलविक्रमः one of immeasureable courage, सुमहति any kind, अपराधेऽपि harm done, दूतस्य at emissary, विरूपकरणम् may be mutilated, दृष्टम् seen, शास्त्रतः in the sastras,वधः killing,नास्ति not there.
data.md: O you of incomparable prowess, there is no sanction for the destruction of a messenger albeit he prepare a mighty iniquity Sometimes they have however been disfigured.

data.v: विभीषणेनैवमुक्तो रावणः संदिदेश तान् । राक्षसानेतदेवाद्य लाङ्गूलं दह्यतामिति ।।
data.es: 'On hearing Vibhishana, Ravana instructed the demons to burn my tail.
data.anv: विभीषणेन by Vibhishana, एवम् in that way, उक्तः having spoken, रावणः Ravana, अस्य his, एतत् all that, लाङ्गूलम् tail, दह्यतामिति to burn, तान् राक्षसान् to the demons, सन्दिदेश instructed.
data.md: Being thus accosted by Vibhīșana, Rāvana ordered all the demons, saying "Burn down this monkey's tail.”

data.v: ततस्तस्य वचः श्रुत्वा मम पुच्छं समन्ततः । वेष्टितं शणवल्कैश्च पटैः कार्पासकैस्तथा ।।
data.es: "Having heard the king's words, all the demons collected and held my tail, wrapped it with saris of fibres and tattered rags of cotton.
data.anv: ततः then, तस्य those, वचः words, श्रुत्वा having heard, मम my, पुच्छम् tail, समन्ततः all of them together, शणवल्कैः saris made of fibre, जीर्णैः tattered, कार्पासजैः of cotton, पटैः rags, वेष्टितम् wrapped.
data.md: Hearing his mandate, the Raksasas, of wellprotected armour and terrible prowess, enveloped my tail with the fibres of cotton, silk and jute. And then striking me with their clenched fists they put fire to my tail.

data.v: राक्षसाः सिद्धसंनाहास्ततस्ते चण्डविक्रमाः । तदादीप्यन्त मे पुच्छं हनन्तः काष्ठमुष्टिभिः ।।
data.es: "Many ferociously courageous demons got ready. They bound me and hit me with firesticks and fists. They fastened my tail with ropes and set in on fire.
data.anv: ततः then, सिद्धसन्नाहाः got ready, चण्डविक्रमाः who had terrific courage, राक्षसाः demons, काष्ठमुष्टिभिः with firesticks and fists, निघ्नन्तः hit, बहुभिः many, पाशैः ropes, बद्धस्य tied, राक्षसैः by the demons, यन्त्रितस्य fastened, मे me, पुच्छम् tail, तदा then, अदह्यन्त set fire.
data.md: Hearing his mandate, the Raksasas, of wellprotected armour and terrible prowess, enveloped my tail with the fibres of cotton, silk and jute. And then striking me with their clenched fists they put fire to my tail.

data.v: बद्धस्य बहुभिः पाशैर्यन्त्रितस्य च राक्षसैः । न मे पीडा भवेत्काचिद्दिदृक्षोर्नगरीं दिवा ।।
data.md: Although bound and fettered with many ropes I did not feel the least anguish for I was very much anxious to behold the city during the day.

data.v: ततस्ते राक्षसाः शूरा बद्धं मामग्निसंवृतम् । अघोषयन्राजमार्गे नगरद्वारमागताः ।।
data.es: "The brave demons took me round the city through the royal streets and announced loudly to let every one know that I am bound and that my tail has been set on fire.
data.anv: ततः then, शूराः courageous, राक्षसाः by demons, नगरद्वारम् gate of the city, आगताः took, बद्धम् bound, अग्निसंवृतम् set on fire, माम् me, राजमार्गे in the royal street, अघोषयन् announced loudly.
data.md: Thereupon fettering me and putting fire to my tail and announcing me in the public streets those heroic Rākșasas got at the city gate.

data.v: ततोऽहं सुमहद्रूपं संक्षिप्य पुनरात्मनः । विमोचयित्वा तं बन्धं प्रकृतिष्ठः स्थितः पुनः ।।
data.es: "I reduced my form and rid of the bondage. Then again I assumed my original huge form and took up an iron bar lying near and killed all the demons (present).
data.anv: ततः then, अहम् I, आत्मनः my own, सुमहत् very huge, रूपम् form, पुनः again, संक्षिप्य assumed small form, तं बन्धम् that bondage, विमोचयित्वा got rid off, पुनः again, प्रकृतिस्थः into my natural huge form, स्थितः stayed, आयसम् near by, परिघम् iron beam, गृह्य took up, तानि रक्षांसि that rakshasas, असूदयम् killed.
data.md: Thereupon contracting again my huge person and relieving myself of the fetters I stood again in my pristine state.

data.v: आयसं परिघं गृह्य तानि रक्षांस्यसूदयम् । ततस्तन्नगरद्वारं वेगेनाप्लुतवानहम् ।।
पुच्छेन च प्रदीप्तेन तां पुरीं साट्टगोपुराम् । दहाम्यहमसंभ्रान्तो युगान्ताग्निरिव प्रजाः ।।
data.es: "Then I leaped to the entrance gate of the city without being perplexed. With my burning tail I set fire to the boundaries and towering mansions which looked like the world at the end of dissolution.
data.anv: ततः then, अहम् I, वेगेन quickly, तत् that, नगरद्वारम् gate of the city, आप्लुतवान् leapt, अहम् I, असंभ्रान्तः not perplexed, युगान्ताग्निः fire at the end of the dissolution, प्रजाः इव like the world, साट्टप्राकारगोपुराम् boundaries and towering mansions, तां पुरीम् of the city, प्रदीप्तेन by fire, पुच्चेन by the tail, दहामि burnt away.
data.md: Taking up iron darts I slew all the Rāks asas there. And leaping over with great velocity the city gate, I, with my burning tail, burnt down the whole city from the palace to its outer gate like to the fire of dissolution devastating the entire creation.

data.v: दग्ध्वा लङ्कां पुनश्चैव शङ्का मामभ्यवर्तत । दहता च मया लङ्कां दग्धा सीता न संशयः ।।
अथाहं वाचमश्रौषं चारणानां शुभाक्षराम् । जानकी न च दग्धेति विस्मयोदन्तभाषिणाम् ।।
data.es: "Thus I was overtaken by sorrow and worry. Just then I heard the wonderful propitious utterances of charanas announcing that Sita was not burnt.
data.anv: इति thus, शोकसमाविष्टः overtaken by sorrow, अहम् I, चिन्ताम् worry, उपागतः became, अथ and then, अहम् I, जानकी Janaki, न च दग्धा not been burn, इति this, विस्मयोदन्तभाषिणाम् wonderful utterances, चारणानाम् from charanas, शुभाक्षराम् propitious, वाचम् words, अश्रौषम् heard.
data.md: While I reflecting thus, being overwhelmed with grief, I heard the auspicious was accents of the Caranas, exciting my wonder, Jänaki has not been burnt down.

data.v: ततो मे बुद्धिरुत्पन्ना श्रुत्वा तामद्भुतां गिरम् । पुनर्दृष्टा च वैदेही विसृष्टश्च तया पुनः ।।
data.es: "It was amazing to hear the words of the charanas. On hearing that Jankai had not been burnt, I understood that it is on her account (that he is also not burnt although his tail was ignited.)
data.anv: अद्भुताम् amazing, तां गिरम् those words, श्रुत्वा after hearing, ततः then, जानकी Janaki, अदग्धा not been burnt, इत्येवम् this way, मे my, बुद्धिः knew, उत्पन्ना arose, निमित्तैश्च on account of her, उपलक्षिता I understood.

data.v: राघवस्य प्रभावेन भवतां चैव तेजसा । सुग्रीवस्य च कार्यार्थं मया सर्वमनुष्ठितम् ।।
data.es: "Everything was favourable to me by the power of Rama, by your goodwill and for the great purpose of Sugriva.
data.anv: राघवस्य Rama's, प्रभावेण by the power, भवताम् your, तेजसा चैव grace, सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva's, कार्यार्थं च on his account, मया for me, सर्वम् all, अनुष्ठितम् was favourable.
data.md: By virtue of Rāma's grace and your prowess I have satisfied the charge of Sugrīva.

data.v: एतत्सर्वं मया तत्र यथावदुपपादितम् । अत्र यन्न कृतं शेषं तत्सर्वं क्रियतामिति ।।
data.es: "Let all that could not be done there and still remains to be done, be accomplished by you. I have presented the entire thing".इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे अष्टपञ्चाशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fiftyeighth sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: एतत् all that, सर्वम् entire, तत्र there, मया by me, यथावत् as it is, उपपादितम् presented, अत्र there, यत् whatever, न कृतम् not done, शेषम् remaining task, तत् that, सर्वम् everything, क्रियताम् will do.
data.md: I have thus related to you, what I had performed in Lankā, and it now remains with you to fulfill the rest.

data.v: एतदाख्यानं तत्सर्वं हनूमान्मारुतात्मजः । भूयः समुपचक्राम वचनं वक्तुमुत्तरम् ।।
data.es: On hearing Sita's new belittling statement about him, Hanuman, the illustrious son of the Windgod reflected:
data.anv: मारुतात्मजः son of the Windgod, हनुमान् Hanuman, सर्वम् entire, तत् एतत् all that, आख्याय having narrated, भूयः whatever happened, उत्तरं वचनम् the good words, वक्तुम् told, समुपचक्राम again started telling.
data.md: Having related all, Hanuman, the wind-god's son began again, saying.

data.v: सफलो राघवोद्योगः सुग्रीवस्य च संभ्रमः । शीलमासाद्य सीताया मम च प्लवनं महत् ।।
data.es: "It is due to Rama's exertions, Sugriva's endeavour and Sita's conduct that I have been successful. My devotion to Sita has further deepened.
data.anv: राघवोद्योगः Rama's exertions, सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva's, सम्भ्रमः enthusiasm, सीतायाः Sita's, शीलम् conduct, आसाद्य attained, सफलः successl, मम I am, मनश्च in my mind, प्रवणम् developed devotion.
data.md: Fruitful is Rāghava's endeavour and Sugrīva's energy, for greatly pleased have I been with Sita's conduct.

data.md: O heroic monkeys, Sītā has been keeping the life of a highly chaste damsel. She can maintain the animated creation by virtue of her asceticism and burn it with her ire.

data.v: अचिन्तयन्ती वैदेही रावणं बलदर्पितम् । पतिव्रता च सुश्रोणी अवष्टब्धा च जानकी ।।
data.md: And Vaidehi, having a beautiful waist and devoted to her husband, did not care for Rāvana proud of his prowess and was accordingly confined by him.

data.es: "Chaste Sita of beautiful hips, an auspicious lady though bound is wholly devoted to Rama alone like Sachi, the wife of Indra who was bound by Nahusha.

data.md: And that graceful daughter of the king of Vaidehī was by all means devoted to her lord and had all her thoughts centred in him like to Paulomi (The wife of Indra the lord of the celestials who was confined by the king Nahușa) devoted to her lord Purandara.

data.es: "I saw Sita often threatened by uglylooking ogresses. Wearing a single braid, she looked pathetic, thinking always about her husband, lying on the bare ground. She was like a lustreless lotus in winter. Spurning the advances by Ravana, she is rather determined to commit suicide.

data.v: एकवेणीधरा दीना भर्तृचिन्तापरायणा । अधःशय्या विवर्णाङ्गी पद्मिनीव हिमागमे ।।
रावणाद्विनिवृत्तार्था मर्तव्यकृतनिश्चया । कथंचिन्मृगशावाक्षी विश्वासमुपपादिता ।।

data.es: "I created a little confidence in the fawneyed lady by pacifying her and explaining her with great difficulty the alliance of Rama and Sugriva on hearing which she became happy.

data.md: And hearing of the friendship between Rāma and Sugrīva she attained to an excess of delight. She is well behaved and devoted to her lord per excellence and blessed is the high-souled and ten-necked demon that she has not destroyed him (yet). And Rama shall become an instrument only in in bringing about his destruction.

data.md: I have related to you what had happened. It now behove us to behold Vaidehi along with those two sons of a king, after commanding all the monkeys headed by Jambavan and others.

data.md: I am alone capable of destroying the city of Lankā along with the Rākşasas and their lord Rāvana. What more can I achieve if I am accompanied by the heroic monkeys like ye, powerful, having control over their own minds, well-arıned, able and desirous of winning victory!

data.v: अहं तु रावणं युद्धे ससैन्यं सपुरःसरम् । सपुत्रं विधमिष्यामि सहोदरयुतं युधि ।।
data.es: "I can also kill all the army, his followers, sons and brothers of Ravana in war.

data.md: I shall slay Răvaņa in conflict along with his sons, brothers army and retinue.

data.v: ब्राह्ममैन्द्रं च रौद्रं च वायव्यं वारुणं तथा । यदि शक्रजितोऽस्त्राणि दुर्निरीक्ष्याणि संयुगे । तान्यहं विधमिष्यामि निहनिष्यामि राक्षसान् ।।
data.es: "Even if the missiles used by Indrajit are Brahmastra, Indrastra, Rudrastra, Vayavastra, Varunastra which are difficult to see. I will destroy them in war and kill them.
data.anv: ब्राह्मम् Brahma's, ऐन्द्रं च even Indra's, रौद्रं च Rudra's, वायव्यम् or Windgod's, तथा similarly, वारुणम् Varuna's, शक्रजितः Indrajit, अस्त्राणि missiles, दुर्निरीक्षाणि though difficult to see, यदि such, तानि of them, संयुगे in war, वधिष्यामि will kill, राक्षसान् demon, हनिष्यामि च and destroy them.
data.md: I shall destroy all the Rākşasas and baffle all the weapons of Indrajit conferred on him by Brahmā, Rudra, wind and Varuņa albeit they are invisible in battle.

data.v: भवतामभ्यनुज्ञातो विक्रमो मे रुणद्धि तम् ।।
मयातुला विसृष्टा हि शैलवृष्टिर्निरन्तरा । देवानपि रणे हन्यात्किं पुनस्तान्निशाचरान् ।।
data.es: Now if I am permitted, I shall repulse them and destroy them with my valour. A ceaseless shower of rocks sent forth by me in war is enough to destroy even gods what to say about the nightrangers?
data.anv: भवताम् by you, अभ्यनुज्ञातः now permit me, मे I, विक्रमः with my valour, तम् them, रुणद्धि  shattered,मया by me, विसृष्टा sent forth, अतुला matchless, निरन्तरा ceaseless, शैलवृष्टिः shower of rocks, रणे in war, देवानपि even gods, हन्यात् will die, तान् those, निशाचरान् nightrangers, किं पुनः what to say ?
data.md: Without your perinission my prowess has been bought to a stand still. Hills and mountains, uprooted and discharged by me continually, can destroy even the celestials, what of those nightrangers?

data.v: सागरोऽप्यतियाद्वेलां मन्दरः प्रचलेदपि । न जाम्बवन्तं समरे कम्पयेदरिवाहिनी ।।
data.es: "The ocean may exceed its limits, the mountain Mandara may be shaken from its position but no hostile army can move Jambavan in war.
data.anv: सागरः ocean, वेलाम् shore, अतियादपि exceeds also, मन्दरः mountain Mandara, प्रचलेदपि may shake up, समरे in war, अरिवाहिनी flow of enemies, जाम्बवन्तम् Jambavan, न कम्पयेत् not move.
data.md: Without your permission my prowess has been bought to a stand still. Even if the ocean overflow its banks, the Mount Mandara move off its place, the enemy's host cannot frighten Jāmbavăn in conflict.

data.v: सर्वराक्षससंघानां राक्षसा ये च पूर्वकाः । अलमेको विनाशाय वीरो वायुसुतः कपिः ।।
data.anv: वीरः hero, वालिसुतः son of Vali, कपिः vanara, एकः alone, सर्वराक्षससङ्घानाम् all the demon hordes, पूर्वकाः led, ये by him, विनाशाय to destroy, अलम् enough.
data.md: And specially the heroic monkey, Vali's son, is alone capable of destroying the whole host of the Raksasas.

data.v: पनसस्योरुवेगेन नीलस्य च महात्मनः । मन्दरोऽप्यवशीर्येत किं पुनर्युधि राक्षसाः ।।
data.es: "Even the mountain Mandara would be shattered by great Panasa or Nila by the speed of their thighs. What to say in a battle against ogres?
data.anv: पनसस्य Panasa's, महात्मनः great soul, नीलस्य च even Nila, उरुवेगेन by the speed of his thighs, मन्दरोऽपि even Mandara mountain, अवशीर्येत would be shattered, युधि in battle, राक्षसाः demons, किं पुनः what to say again.
data.md: Even the mount Mandra is weakened by the velocity of the thighs of the high-souled monkey Nīla-what of the Rākşasas in conflict?

data.v: सदेवासुरयुद्धेषु गन्धर्वोरगपक्षिषु । मैन्दस्य प्रतियोद्धारं शंसत द्विविदस्य वा ।।
data.es: "Who among gods, yakshas, gandharvas, nagas and birds can contend Mainda or Dvivida in battle?Tell me.
data.anv: सदेवासुरयक्षेषु gods, and yakshas, गन्दर्वोरगपक्षिषु gandharvas, nagas and birds, मैन्दस्य Mainda's, द्विविदस्य वा or Dvivida, प्रतियोद्दारम् who can oppose in battle, शंसत tell me.
data.md: What hero is there among the celestials, Asuras, Yaksas, Gandharvas, serpents and birds who can equal Manida or Dvivida in battle?

data.es: "The (two) sons of Aswini are outstanding and foremost fighters and proud of waging war. Who can oppose them? I do not see any one.

data.anv: राजपुत्र O prince, भवान् you, यथा this way, पश्यति thought of, एषा also, मतिः to my mind, नः none, अक्षमा acceptable, न तावत् we are capable, तु you, रामस्य Rama's, मतिः mind, यथा this way, निविष्टा should act, तथा that way, भवान् you, कार्यसिद्धिम् to accomplish the work, पश्यतु do it.
data.md: What you had judged, O prince, is liked by us. And still you should look to Rāma's resolution and bring about his end.

data.v: ततो जाम्बवतो वाक्यमगृह्णन्त वनौकसः । अङ्गदप्रमुखा वीरा हनूमांश्च महाकपिः ।।

data.md: All the heroic monkeys, headed by Angada and the great monkey Hanumān, approved highly of the words of Jāmbavān.

data.v: प्रीतिमन्तस्ततः सर्वे वायुपुत्रपुरःसराः । महेन्द्राग्रं परित्यज्य पुप्लुवुः प्लवगर्षभाः ।।
data.md: And these leading monkeys headed by the Wind-god's son proceeded leading from the summit of the Mount Mahendra.

data.md: And there highly powerful ones, having huge persons, resembling the Mount Mandara, covered the welkin as if like so many mad elephants.

data.v: प्लवमानाः खमाप्लुत्य ततस्ते काननौक्षकः । नन्दनोपममासेदुर्वनं द्रुमलतायुतम् ।।
data.es: "The monkeys leaped into the sky and entered the garden that resembled the garden of Indra filled with trees and creepers.

data.md: And leaping and ascending the sky they got at the Madhuvana, (An orchard teeming with various trees bearing delicious and sweet fruits) preserved by Sugrīva, resembling the celestial garden, covered with many trees, picturesque and incapable of being divastated by any.

data.v: यत्तन्मधुवनं नाम सुग्रीवस्याभिरक्षितम् । अधृष्यं सर्वभूतानां सर्वभूतमनोहरम् ।।

data.v: यद्रक्षति महावीर्यः सदा दधिमुखः कपिः । मातुलः कपिमुख्यस्य सुग्रीवस्य महात्मनः ।।
data.es: Dadhimukha, the foremost of all monkeys, of great valour and the maternal uncle of Sugriva was the caretaker of the garden.

data.md: The monkey-chief Sugrīva's maternal uncle, the heroic and high-souled Dadhimukha always guard that picturesque and spacious garden of the lord of monkeys.

data.v: ते तद्वनमुपागम्य बभूवुः परमोत्कटाः । वानरा वानरेन्द्रस्य मनःकान्ततमं महत् ।।
data.es: On reaching the vanara king's extensive, delightful garden all the vanaras highly rejoiced.

data.md: They were greatly worked up with anxiety. And beholding that large orchard, those yellowcoloured monkeys were greatly delighted and begged honey of the prince.

data.md: And the prince respectfully allowed these elderly monkeys headed by Jāmbavān to drink honey.

data.v: ततः कुमारस्तान्वृद्धाञ्जाम्बवत्प्रमुखान्कपीन् । अनुमान्य ददौ तेषां निसर्गं मधुभक्षणे ।।
data.es: Young Angada asked old Jambavan's permission for the vanaras to drink honey and Jambavan permitted them.

data.v: ततश्चानुमताः सर्वे संप्रहृष्टा वनौकसः । मुदिताश्च ततस्ते च प्रनृत्यन्ति ततस्ततः ।।
data.es: Permitted thus to drink honey the forestdwelling monkeys were motivated. They rejoiced very happily and started dancing.

data.md: And thereupon those monkeys, beside themselves with joy for being allowed to drink honey began to dance hither and thither.

data.v: महीतलात्केचिदुदीर्णवेगा; महाद्रुमाग्राण्यभिसंपतन्ते । गायन्तमन्यः प्रहसन्नुपैति; हसन्तमन्यः प्रहसन्नुपैति ।।

data.v: रुदन्तमन्यः प्ररुदन्नुपैति; नुदन्तमन्यः प्रणुदन्नुपैति । समाकुलं तत्कपिसैन्यमासी;न्मधुप्रपानोत्कट सत्त्वचेष्टम् । न चात्र कश्चिन्न बभूव मत्तो; न चात्र कश्चिन्न बभूव तृप्तो ।।
data.es: The army of monkeys had lost control over their bodies due to drinking of honeywine. Not even one was quietly seated there. Not even one was not intoxicated. Not only that, none were satisfied.

data.md: Some were stricking with their nails and others struck them in return. And thus the entire monkey host were bewildered with intoxication. There was none among them who was not drunk and none who was not excited with pride.

data.v: ततो वनं तत्परिभक्ष्यमाणं; द्रुमांश्च विध्वंसितपत्रपुष्पान् । समीक्ष्य कोपाद्दधिवक्त्रनामा; निवारयामास कपिः कपींस्तान् ।।
data.es: Beholding the destruction wrought by the vanaras to the garden, trees, leaves and flowers, and having drunk all the honey, Dadhimukha angrily asked them to stop and get out.
data.anv: ततः that, दधिवक्त्रनामा named Dadhimukha, कपिः monkey, परिभक्ष्यमाणम् drank all the honeywine, तत् that, वनम् garden, विध्वंसितपत्रपुष्पान् leaves, flowers, द्रुमांश्च and trees, समीक्ष्य seeing, कोपात् in anger, तान् कपीन् the monkeys, निवारयामास asked them to stop and get out.
data.md: Thereupon beholding all the fruits eaten up and the trees divested of leaves and flowers, the monkey Dadhimukha and worked up with ire and attempted to prevent them.

data.es: Then the heroic guards in their thousands fell on the vanaras proud of their power on and under the tala trees.
data.anv: ततः then, वीराः heroic, पालाः guards, सहस्रशः in thousands, वृक्षस्थांश्च on the trees, तलस्थांश्च under the trees, बलदर्पितान् proud of their power, वानरान् vanaras, अभ्यक्रामन् attacked.

data.v: अथ दृष्ट्वा दधिमुखं क्रुद्धं वानरपुंगवाः । अभ्यधावन्त वेगेन हनूमत्प्रमुखास्तदा ।।
data.es: Having seen the fury of Dadhimukha, Hanuman the leader of the vanaras went to him swiftly.
data.anv: अथ and then, हनुमत्प्रमुखाः leader Hanuman, वानरपुङ्गवाः foremost of vanaras, तदा then, दधिमुखम् Dadhimukha's, क्रुद्धम् fury, दृष्ट्वा having seen, वेगेन swiftly, अभ्यधावन्त went there.
data.md: And beholding Dadhimukha greatly enraged, all the monkeys, headed by Hanumān, approached him with great vehemence.

data.v: तं सवृक्षं महाबाहुमापतन्तं महाबलम् । आर्यकं प्राहरत्तत्र बाहुभ्यां कुपितोऽङ्गदः ।।
data.es: Seeing the revered, powerful and strongarmed Dadhimukha rushing to him, the angry Angada caught him with both hands tightly.
data.anv: कुपितः angry, अङ्गदः Angada, सवृक्षम् with trees, महाबाहुम् strongarmed, महाबलम् powerful, आपतन्तम् coming, तम् him, आर्यकम् तत्र there, बाहुभ्याम् with both hands, प्राहरत्  clasped tightly.
data.md: And as the mighty Dadhimukha of huge arms, was proceeding towards them vehemently with a huge tree, Angada, wroth, caught him by the hand.

data.v: मदान्धश न वेदैनमार्यकोऽयं ममेति सः । अथैनं निष्पिपेषाशु वेगवद्वसुधातले ।।
data.es: "Blinded by arrogance, the prince pushed him (Dadhimukha) on the floor forcibly, forgetting that he was his revered granduncle.
data.anv: सः he, मदान्धश्च blinded by arrogance, अयम् this, मम my, आर्यकः revered, इति this, एनम् therefore, न वेद not understnding that (I am his granduncle), अथ now, एनम् therefore, वसुधातले on the floor, वेगवत् forcibly, आशु him, निष्पिपेष pushed.
data.md: He was beside himself with intoxication and therefore did not show him the least mercy, albeit he (Dadhimukha) was worshipful to him. And accordingly with great vehemence he ground him to the dust.

data.v: स भग्नबाहुर्विमुखो विह्वलः शोणितोक्षितः । मुमोह सहसा वीरो मुहूर्तं कपिकुञ्जरः ।।
data.es: The heroic Dadhimukha, an elephant among monkeys, with his shoulders and arms broken, and body drenched in blood lost his consciousness instantly.
data.anv: भग्नबाहूरुभुजः with shoulders and arms broken, विह्वलः battered, शोणितोक्षितः body drenched in blood, सः he, Dadhimukha, वीरः a hero, कपिकुञ्जरः elephant among monkeys, सहसा at once, मुहूर्तम् in a moment, मुमोह lost conciousness.
data.md: His arms and thighs were broken and his countenance was disfigured and that great hero, the foremost of the monkeys, bathed in a pool of blood, remained senseless for sometime.

data.v: स कथंचिद्विमुक्तस्तैर्वानरैर्वानरर्षभः । उवाचैकान्तमागम्य भृत्यांस्तान्समुपागतान् ।।
data.es: Escaping from the vanaras with great difficulty, Dadhimukha, a bull among monkeys, repaired to a secluded place and said to his servants:
data.anv: तैः they, वानरैः vanaras, कथञ्चित् with great difficulty, विमुक्तः escaped, सः he, Dadhimukha, वानरर्षभः bull among monkeys, एकान्तम् secluded, आश्रित्य reached, समुपागतान् returned, स्वान् them, भृत्यान् servants, उवाच said.
data.md: And thereupon releasing himself from them by some device that leading monkey, proceeded to a nook, and addressed his attendants, saying.

data.v: एते तिष्ठन्तु गच्छामो भर्ता नो यत्र वानरः । सुग्रीवो विपुलग्रीवः सह रामेण तिष्ठति ।।
data.es: "Let them stay here. Our broadnecked king Sugriva will be there with Rama. Let us go to him.
data.anv: एते let them, तिष्ठन्तु stay, नः our, भर्ता king, वानरः vanaras, विपुलग्रीवः one with broad neck, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, यत्र there, रामेण सह with Rama, तिष्ठति will be staying, गच्चामः let us go.
data.md: Let us all proceed there where our lord, the spacious-necked Sugrīva live with Rāma.

data.v: सर्वं चैवाङ्गदे दोषं श्रावयिष्यामि पार्थिव । अमर्षी वचनं श्रुत्वा घातयिष्यति वानरान् ।।
data.anv: अङ्गदे Angada, सर्वम् all, दोषम् mistakes, पार्थिवे to the king, श्रावयिष्यामि will let him know, वचनम् these words, श्रुत्वा having heard, अमर्षि very furious, वानरान् vanaras, घातयिष्यति will put an end.
data.md: I shall relate to him all the unfair dealings of Angada and forsooth shall that wrathful king punish all these monkeys

data.v: इष्टं मधुवनं ह्येतत्सुग्रीवस्य महात्मनः । पितृपैतामहं दिव्यं देवैरपि दुरासदम् ।।
data.es: 'Madhuvan has come down to us from our forefather's time. Dear to the king, its entry is prohibited even to the gods.
data.anv: पितृपैतामहम् from grandfather and father, दिव्यम् wonderful, देवैरपि even for devatas, दुरासदम् forbidden, एतत् this, मधुवनम् Madhuvanam, महात्मनः great self, पार्थिवस्य to the king, इष्टं हि very dear.
data.md: The picturesque Madhuvana is the most favourite orchard of the high-souled Sugrīva. It was enjoyed by his forefathers and is not even approached by the celestials.

data.v: स वानरानिमान्सर्वान्मधुलुब्धान्गतायुषः । घातयिष्यति दण्डेन सुग्रीवः ससुहृज्जनान् ।।
data.es: 'Sugriva will chase all the vanaras and their friends greedy for honey. They will be punished with a stick. They are doomed'.
data.anv: सः सुग्रीवः that Sugriva, मधुलुब्धान् those greedy for honey, गतायुषः doomed, ससुहृज्जनान् their friends, इमान् these, सर्वान् all, वानरान् vanaras, दण्डेन with a stick, घातयिष्यति will be beaten.
data.md: And meting out punishment to these monkeys, eager to drink honey and almost half dead, Sugrīva shall slay them as will as their friends and relatives.

data.v: वध्या ह्येते दुरात्मानो नृपाज्ञा परिभाविनः । अमर्षप्रभवो रोषः सफलो नो भविष्यति ।।
data.es: 'Indeed those evilminded ones who have disobeyed the king's order deserve to be killed.That way our fury and forbearance will result in success'.
data.anv: नृपाज्ञापरिभाविनः who have disobeyed the king's order, एते they, दुरात्मनः evilminded, वध्याः हि indeed deserve to be killed, अमर्षप्रभवः forbearance king, नः रोषः our fury, सफलः will result in success, भविष्यति will be.
data.md: Those vicious-souled ones are worthy of being slain since they have transgressed the royal mandate. And then shall my wrath, arising out of impatience, bear fruits.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा दधिमुखो वनपालान्महाबलः । जगाम सहसोत्पत्य वनपालैः समन्वितः ।।
data.es: Powerful Dadhimukha having said that to the guardians of the garden rose up to the sky and went off with them.
data.anv: महाबलः very powerful, दधिमुखः Dadhimukha, वनसालान् garden protectors, एवम् in that way, उक्त्वा having said, सहसा at once, वनपालैः garden guards, समन्वितः along with them, उत्पत्य rising to the sky, जगाम went.
data.md: Having thus spoken to the guards of the forest the highly powerful Dadhimukha leaped high up in the welkin and went away with them.

data.v: निमेषान्तरमात्रेण स हि प्राप्तो वनालयः । सहस्रांशुसुतो धीमान्सुग्रीवो यत्र वानरः ।।
data.es: In a moment, Dadhimukha reached the place where wise Sugriva, the son of Sungod was there
data.anv: सः he, वनालयः forestdweller, सहस्रांशुसुतः to the son of Sungod, धीमान् wise, सुग्रीवः वानरः to the vanara Sugriva, यत्र there, निमेषान्तरमात्रेण in a moment's time, प्राप्तः reached.
data.md: And in no time he reached where the highly intelligent "Niether monkey/Sugriva, the offspring of the sun, was."

data.v: रामं च लक्ष्मणं चैव दृष्ट्वा सुग्रीवमेव च । समप्रतिष्ठां जगतीमाकाशान्निपपात ह ।।
data.es: Seeing Rama, Lakshmana and also Sugriva from the sky he landed on an even ground.
data.anv: रामं च Rama, लक्ष्मणं चैव and also Lakshmana, सुग्रीवमेव च and also Sugriva, दृष्ट्वा seeing, आकाशात् from the sky, समप्रतिष्ठाम् even, जगतीम् ground, निपपात landed.
data.md: And beholding Rāma, Lakṣmaṇa, and Sugrīva and the level ground he descended from the sky.

data.v: स निपत्य महावीर्यः सर्वैस्तैः परिवारितः । हरिर्दधिमुखः पालैः पालानां परमेश्वरः ।।
data.es: Dadhimukha, a great hero and king of the guards protecting Madhuvanam surrounded by his servants, with a sad expression on his face offered painful obeisance with folded hands bowing down his forehead at the feet of Sugriva. इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे द्विषष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the sixtysecond sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: सर्वैः all, तैः पालैः those guards, परिवारितः the servants, पालानाम् king, परमेश्वरः lord, हरिः of monkeys, महावीर्यः great hero, सः दधिमुखः that Dadhimukha, दीनवदनः with a painful expression on the face, शिरसि head bowed down, अञ्जलिम् salutations with folded hands, कृत्वा having offered, सन्निपत्य surrounded by, सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva, शुभे auspicious, चरणौ feet, मूर्ध्ना touching with his forehead, पत्यपीडयत् painful obeisance.
data.md: And descending from the sky that great and heroic Dabhimukha ,lord over all the monkeys engaged in protecting the forest, placing his folded palms on his forehead and with a poorly countenance, laid low his crown at Sugrīva's feet.

data.v: स दीनवदनो भूत्वा कृत्वा शिरसि चाञ्जलिम् । सुग्रीवस्य शुभौ मूर्ध्ना चरणौ प्रत्यपीडयत् ।।
data.es: Dadhimukha, a great hero and king of the guards protecting Madhuvanam surrounded by his servants, with a sad expression on his face offered painful obeisance with folded hands bowing down his forehead at the feet of Sugriva. इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये सुन्दरकाण्डे द्विषष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the sixtysecond sarga of Sundarakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: सर्वैः all, तैः पालैः those guards, परिवारितः the servants, पालानाम् king, परमेश्वरः lord, हरिः of monkeys, महावीर्यः great hero, सः दधिमुखः that Dadhimukha, दीनवदनः with a painful expression on the face, शिरसि head bowed down, अञ्जलिम् salutations with folded hands, कृत्वा having offered, सन्निपत्य surrounded by, सुग्रीवस्य Sugriva, शुभे auspicious, चरणौ feet, मूर्ध्ना touching with his forehead, पत्यपीडयत् painful obeisance.
data.md: And descending from the sky that great and heroic Dabhimukha ,lord over all the monkeys engaged in protecting the forest, placing his folded palms on his forehead and with a poorly countenance, laid low his crown at Sugrīva's feet.

data.v: ततो मूर्ध्ना निपतितं वानरं वानरर्षभः । दृष्ट्वैवोद्विग्नहृदयो वाक्यमेतदुवाच ह ।।
data.es: Feeling anxious on seeing Dadhimukha touching his feet with his forehead, Sugriva, the bull among vanaras said:
data.anv: ततः then, वानरर्षभः bull among vanaras, मूर्ध्ना forehead, निपतितम् prostrated, वानरम् vanara, Dadhimukha, दृष्ट्वैव as soon as he saw, उद्विग्नहृदयः anxious at heart, एतत् these, वाक्यम् words, उवाच ह spoke.
data.md: And beholding that monkey place his crown at his feet the monkey-chief, with an anxious mind, accosted him, saying.

data.v: उत्तिष्ठोत्तिष्ठ कस्मात्त्वं पादयोः पतितो मम । अभयं ते भवेद्वीर सत्यमेवाभिधीयताम् ।।
data.es: "O heroic Dadhimukha, get up. Tell me why you have fallen at my feet. I give you protection from all.
data.anv: वीर hero, उत्तिष्ठ उत्तिष्ठ get up, get up, त्वम् you, कस्मात् why, मम my, पादयोः feet, पतितः fallen, ते to you, अभयम् give you protection, भवेत् you be, सर्वमेव from all, अभिधीयताम् you may tell.

data.v: स तु विश्वासितस्तेन सुग्रीवेण महात्मना । उत्थाय च महाप्राज्ञो वाक्यं दधिमुखोऽब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: When great Sugriva gave assurance to wise Dadhimukha, he got up and said:
data.anv: महात्मना great self, तेन सुग्रीवेण by Sugriva, विश्वासितः given assurance, सुमहाप्राज्ञः very wise, सः दधिमुखः that Dadhimukha, उत्थाय got up, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Being thus addressed hopefully by the highsouled Sugrīva, Dadhimukha, gifted with an intelligence of a very high order, rose up and spoke.

data.v: नैवर्क्षरजसा राजन्न त्वया नापि वालिना । वनं निसृष्टपूर्वं हि भक्षितं तत्तु वानरैः ।।
data.es: "O king in your time or even before, during the time of Vali, that (Madhuvanam) was forbidden for entry. Now it has been laid waste by the trespassing vanaras.
data.anv: राजन् O king, वनम्  garden, ऋक्षरजसा in Riksharaja's time, नैव निसृष्टपूर्वं हि or even before, त्वया your time, न not, वालिनापि even at the time of Vali, न not, तच्च accessible to go, वानरैः vanaras, भक्षितम् finished eating.
data.md: Neither yourself, nor Vāli, the lord of the monkeys, O king, allowed that orchard to be freely used by the monkeys but that has been now laid waste by them.

data.v: एभिः प्रधर्षिताश्चैव वारिता वनरक्षिभिः । मधून्यचिन्तयित्वेमान्भक्षयन्ति पिबन्ति च ।।
data.es: "Even though the garden guards forcibly tried to prevent them they did not care and have devoured all the honey.
data.anv: एभिः they also, वनरक्षिभिः garden guards, प्रधर्षिताश्चैव even though resisted, वानराः vanaras, इमान् them, अचिन्तयित्वा not cared for, मधूनि honey, भक्षयन्ति finished eating, पिबन्ति च and drinking.
data.md: They were prevented, O lord, in their act of devastation, by these guards, but those monkeys, without caring for me the least, feasted there.

data.v: शिष्टमत्रापविध्यन्ति भक्षयन्ति तथापरे । निवार्यमाणास्ते सर्वे भ्रुवौ वै दर्शयन्ति हि ।।
data.es: "Some have thrown off the leftovers, when others were prevented from drinking off the honey, they raised their eyebrows (to show their grouch).
data.anv: शिष्टम् left over, अत्र there, अपविध्यन्ति thrown off, तथा similarly, अपरे others, भक्षयन्ति eating, ते सर्वे all, निवार्यमाणाः when we prevented, भ्रुवः eyebrows, दर्शयन्ति च raising to show (a sign of arrogance)
data.md: Some of them went beyond the pale of food conduct, others ate at their pleasure, and all frowned (at us).

data.v: इमे हि संरब्धतरास्तथा तैः संप्रधर्षिताः । वारयन्तो वनात्तस्मात्क्रुद्धैर्वानरपुंगवैः ।।
data.es: "When the guards asked the vanaras to leave the garden the enraged vanaras misbehaved with them.
data.anv: संरब्दतराः when enraged guards, तथा that way, तस्मात् from that, वनात् garden, वारयन्तः vanaras, इमे to go, क्रुद्धैः angry, तैः they, वानरपुङ्गवैः vanara leaders, सम्प्रधर्षिताः ill treated them.
data.md: When these attendants, being insulted by them, were greatly wroth, they were driven out of the garden, by those powerful and enraged monkeys.

data.v: ततस्तैर्बहुभिर्वीरैर्वानरैर्वानरर्षभाः । संरक्तनयनैः क्रोधाद्धरयः संप्रचालिताः ।।
data.es: "O Sugriva the vanara guards were chased away by the many heroic monkeys, angry and redeyed.
data.anv: वानरर्षभ bull among vanaras, ततः then, क्रोधात् in fury, संरक्तनयनैः redeyed, वीरैः heroes, बहुभिः many, तैः them, वानरैः vanara guards, हरयः monkeys, प्रविचालिताः chased.
data.md: They were greatly assailed by those many thousand heroic monkeys, worked up with ire and having reddened eyes.

data.v: पाणिभिर्निहताः केचित्केचिज्जानुभिराहताः । प्रकृष्टाश्च यथाकामं देवमार्गं च दर्शिताः ।।
data.es: Permitted by Hanuman (to enter Madhuvanam and drink), they dragged one another forcefully tossed up on their knees showing their private parts.
data.anv: हनूमता Hanuman, दत्तवरैर्हतं by whom they were permitted, वयं च and us, मधुवनं Madhuvanam, जानुभिः knees, बलात् forcefully, कृष्टा holding, देवमार्गं च  dragged to the private parts, दर्शिताः and showed.
data.md: Some had their arins broken, some had their knee-joints crushed and some of them were thrown up in the sky.

data.v: एवमेते हताः शूरास्त्वयि तिष्ठति भर्तरि । कृत्स्नं मधुवनं चैव प्रकामं तैः प्रभक्ष्यते ।।
data.es: These heroes struck that way devoured the Madhuvanam on the earth at their will and devoured the honey even when you are there as king.
data.anv: त्वयि you, भर्तरि when you are the king, तिष्ठति staying, एते these, शूराः heroes, एवम् in that way, हताः striking, तैः they, कृत्स्नम् on the earth, मधुवनं चैव Madhuvanam aslo, प्रकामम् at their will, प्रभक्ष्यते eating so.
data.md: Yourself their lord living, these heroes are beaten, and the entire Madhuvana is being freely enjoyed by them.

data.v: एवं विज्ञाप्यमानं तु सुग्रीवं वानरर्षभम् । अपृच्छत्तं महाप्राज्ञो लक्ष्मणः परवीरहा ।।
data.es: While Dadhimukha appealed thus to wise Sugriva, Lakshmana the killer of enemies happened to see them and enquired:
data.anv: एवम् in that way, विज्ञाप्यमानम् having appealed, वानरर्षभम् bulls among vanaras, तं सुग्रीवम् to Sugriva, परवीरहा killer of enemies, महाप्राज्ञः very learned, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, अपृच्छत् enquired.
data.md: The highly intelligent Lakşmaņa, the slayer of foes, addressed Sugriva, the foremost O the monkeys, while he was thus being informed, saying.

data.v: किमयं वानरो राजन्वनपः प्रत्युपस्थितः । कं चार्थमभिनिर्दिश्य दुःखितो वाक्यमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: "O king why has this protector of the garden come here? Why is he sad? What is he narrating, asked Lakshmana.
data.anv: राजन् O king, वनप: protector of the garden, अयं वानरः this vanara, किम् why, प्रत्युपस्थितः came here?, दुःखितः sad, कम् why, अर्थम् for what, अभिनिर्दिश्य what is he telling, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: O king, why has this monkey, the guard over the forest, come to you, and what sorrow has led him to give vent to these expressions?

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु सुग्रीवो लक्ष्मणेन महात्मना । लक्ष्मणं प्रत्युवाचेदं वाक्यं वाक्यविशारदः ।।
data.es: Great prince Lakshmana thus said, Sugriva the proficient speaker replied:
data.anv: महात्मना great prince, लक्ष्मणेन by Lakshmana, एवम् in that way, उक्तः having spoken, वाक्यविशारदः proficient in speech, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, इदम् these, वाक्यम् words, प्रत्युवाच replied.
data.md: Being thus addressed by the high-souled Laksmana, Sugriva, skilled in the art of speech, replied.

data.v: आर्य लक्ष्मण संप्राह वीरो दधिमुखः कपिः । अङ्गदप्रमुखैर्वीरैर्भक्षितं मधुवानरैः ।।
data.es: 'O venerable Lakshmana Dadhimukha as complaining that the fruits and honey have been consumed by the vanara heroes, Angada and others who have come after their search for Sita in the southern direction.
data.anv: आर्य O venerable one, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, वीरः hero, कपिः monkey, दधिमुखः Dadhimukha, सम्प्राह to search, दक्षिणाम् southern, आशाम् hope, विचित्य having searched, आगतैः have come, हरिपुङ्गवैः monkey leaders, वीरैः heroic ones, अङ्गदप्रमुखैः Angada and others, वानरैः vanaras, मधु honey, भक्षितम् eaten.
data.md: O worshipful Lakşmaņa, the heroic monkey Dadhimukha speaks that the war-like monkeys headed by Angada have drunk honey.

data.v: नैषामकृतकृत्यानामीदृशः स्यादुपक्रमः । वनं यथाभिपन्नं तैः साधितं कर्म वानरैः ।।
data.es: "Those vanaras having entered Madhuvanam and broken the trees are quite right. Had they not accomplished their purpose they would not have indulged themselves that way.
data.anv: अकृतकृत्यानाम् in case they have not accomplished, उपक्रमः return, ईदृशः this way, यद्यपि स्यात् acted that way, सः he, दीनवदनः pathetic face, भ्रान्त विप्लुतमानसः perplexed and unsteady in mind, भवेत् would be.
data.md: They would not have engaged in such an unfair proceeding had they been unsuccessful in their mission. They have surely achieved success while they have thus been bent upon devastating the orchard.

data.v: दृष्टा देवी न संदेहो न चान्येन हनूमता । न ह्यन्यः साधने हेतुः कर्मणोऽस्य हनूमतः ।।
data.es: "Hanuman is the one who has accomplished this task. Who else can? No doubt, he has seen Sita.
data.anv: कर्मणो this task, हेतुस्साधनेऽस्य the reason for accomplishing, देवी Sita, दृष्टा saw, सन्देहः doubt, न  not, अन्येन not others, न not, हनुमता Hanuman.

data.v: कार्यसिद्धिर्हनुमति मतिश्च हरिपुंगव । व्यवसायश्च वीर्यं च श्रुतं चापि प्रतिष्ठितम् ।।
data.es: "Hanuman alone has the ability to do it, the reason being he has the capacity the wisdom, streneous effort, virility and enthusiasm to accomplish it. These attributes are wellestablished in him.
data.anv: अस्य कर्मणः that duty, साधने capacity, हनूमतः Hanuman, अन्यः others, हेतुः the reason being, न हि not indeed, कार्यसिद्धि: capacity to accomplish, मतिश्चैव even wisdom, व्यवसायश्च even strenuous effort, वीर्यं च and virility, श्रुतं चापि enthusiasm, तस्मिन् for him, वानरपुङ्गवे to only the foremost of the monkys, प्रतिष्ठितम् are wellestablished.
data.md: There is none else but Hanumān who is the instrumental of this work, for that best of monkeys has in him a high intellect, know the art of success, is gifted with courage, strength and prowess and is conversant with Śāstras.

data.v: जाम्बवान्यत्र नेता स्यादङ्गदस्य बलेश्वरः । हनूमांश्चाप्यधिष्ठाता न तस्य गतिरन्यथा ।।
data.es: Where Jambavan, Angada and Hanuman are leaders directing the task of the army it must have been accomplished.
data.anv: यत्र where, जाम्बवान् Jambavan, नेता is the leader, स्यात् remains, महाबलः strong, अङ्गदश्च Angada also, हनुमांश्च and Hanuman, अधिष्ठाता directing, तस्य that, गतिः will be done, अन्यथा otherwise, न not.
data.md: That work is sure to succeed whose leading spirits are the mighty Jāmbavāna and Angada, and worker is Hanumăn.

data.v: अङ्गदप्रमुखैर्वीरैर्हतं मधुवनं किल । विचिन्त्य दक्षिणामाशामागतैर्हरिपुंगवैः ।।
data.es: 'O venerable Lakshmana Dadhimukha as complaining that the fruits and honey have been consumed by the vanara heroes, Angada and others who have come after their search for Sita in the southern direction.
data.anv: आर्य O venerable one, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, वीरः hero, कपिः monkey, दधिमुखः Dadhimukha, सम्प्राह to search, दक्षिणाम् southern, आशाम् hope, विचित्य having searched, आगतैः have come, हरिपुङ्गवैः monkey leaders, वीरैः heroic ones, अङ्गदप्रमुखैः Angada and others, वानरैः vanaras, मधु honey, भक्षितम् eaten.

data.v: आगतैश्च प्रविष्टं तद्यथा मधुवनं हि तैः । धर्षितं च वनं कृत्स्नमुपयुक्तं च वानरैः । वारिताः सहिताः पालास्तथा जानुभिराहताः ।।
data.es: "Those vanaras having entered Madhuvanam and broken the trees are quite right. Had they not accomplished their purpose they would not have indulged themselves that way.
data.anv: आगतैः having come, तैः those, वानरैः vanaras, मधुवनम् Madhuvanam, यथा that way, प्रमथितम् entered, कृत्स्नम् whole, वनम् garden, धर्षितम् broken, उपयुक्तं च right, एषाम् they that way, अकृतकृत्यानाम् if they had not accomplished their purpose, ईदृशः this way, उपक्रमः indulged, न स्यात् not done.

data.v: एतदर्थमयं प्राप्तो वक्तुं मधुरवागिह । नाम्ना दधिमुखो नाम हरिः प्रख्यातविक्रमः ।।
data.es: "Here is Dadhimukha, a vanara, known for his valour and sweet tongue. He came here this incident to tell.
data.anv: नाम्ना named, दधिमुखो नाम Dadhimukha, प्रख्यातविक्रमः known for his valour, हरिः monkey, एतदर्थम् on account of it, वक्तुम् to tell, मधुरवाक् sweet tongued, इह here, प्राप्तः came.

data.v: दृष्टा सीता महाबाहो सौमित्रे पश्य तत्त्वतः । अभिगम्य यथा सर्वे पिबन्ति मधु वानराः ।।
data.es: "O strongarmed Saumitri the Vanaras must have seen Sita. Or else, they would not have arrived to drink honey.
data.anv: महाबाहो strongarmed, सौमित्रे O Saumitri, सीता Sita, दृष्टा would have seen, तत्त्वतः truly, पश्य seen, तथा so, वानराः vanaras, सर्वे all, अभिगम्य having arrived, मधु honey, पिबन्ति drank.
data.md: O you of mighty arms, O son of Sumitra, forsooth they have beheld Sītā, since the monkeys, just on their return, have engaged in drinking honey.

data.v: न चाप्यदृष्ट्वा वैदेहीं विश्रुताः पुरुषर्षभ । वनं दात्त वरं दिव्यं धर्षयेयुर्वनौकसः ।।
data.es: "If the renowned vanaras had not seen Vaidehi, they would not have entered the wonderful garden granted as boon (by Brahma).
data.anv: पुरुषर्षभ bull among men, विश्रुताः renowned, वनौकसः forestdwellers, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, अदृष्ट्वा not seen, दत्तवरम् that which was given as boon, दिव्यम् wonderful, वनम् garden, न धर्षयेयुः entered.
data.md: O best of men, they are all well-known monkeys and without espying Vaidehī they would not have engaged in the destruction of that orchard conferred on us as a gift by the celestials.

data.v: ततः प्रहृष्टो धर्मात्मा लक्ष्मणः सहराघवः । श्रुत्वा कर्णसुखां वाणीं सुग्रीववदनाच्च्युताम् ।।
data.es: "Then righteous Rama and Lakshmana rejoiced to hear the words of Sugriva, which were pleasing to the ears.
data.anv: ततः then, सह राघवः also Rama, धर्मात्मा righteous, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, प्रहृष्टः very cheerful rejoiced, सुग्रीववदनात् Sugriva's mouth, च्युताम् delivered, कर्णसुखाम् pleasing to the ears, वाणीम् words, श्रुत्वा having heard, रामः Rama, प्राहृष्यत felt happy, महाबलः mighty strong, लक्ष्मणश्च even Lakshmana, भृशम् very, प्राहृष्यत happy.
data.md: Hearing these words from Sugrīva, pleasant to ears, the virtuous-souled Lakşmaņa along with Rāghava, was greatly pleased.

data.v: प्राहृष्यत भृशं रामो लक्ष्मणश्च महायशाः । श्रुत्वा दधिमुखस्येदं सुग्रीवस्तु प्रहृष्य च । वनपालं पुनर्वाक्यं सुग्रीवः प्रत्यभाषत ।।
data.es: Beautifulnecked Sugriva heard Dadhimukha, the protector of the garden, felt very glad and replied:
data.anv: सुग्रीवः one with beautiful neck, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, दधिमुखस्य Dadhimukha's, इदम् thus, श्रुत्वा having heard, सम्प्रहृष्य च very glad, पुनः again, वनपालम् protector of the garden, वाक्यम् these words, प्रत्यभाषत replied.
data.md: And hearing this from Dadhimukha, Sugrīva, greatly gratified; addressed that lord of the for st, gain, Saying.

data.v: प्रीतोऽस्मि सौम्य यद्भुक्तं वनं तैः कृतकर्मभिः । मर्षितं मर्षणीयं च चेष्टितं कृतकर्मणाम् ।।
data.es: "They went to the garden to drink only after having performed their duty. I am glad about it. Since they have accomplished the purpose, they are to be excused for their behaviour. I have pardoned them.
data.anv: कृतकर्मभिः having performed the duty, तैः they, वनम् garden, यत् भुक्तम् for drinking that honey, सः अहम् I, प्रीतः अस्मि I am pleased, कृतकर्मणाम् having accomplished the task, मर्षणीयम् are to be excused, चेष्टितम् their behaviour, मर्षितम् excused.

data.v: इच्छामि शीघ्रं हनुमत्प्रधाना;न्शाखामृगांस्तान्मृगराजदर्पान् । द्रष्टुं कृतार्थान्सह राघवाभ्यां; श्रोतुं च सीताधिगमे प्रयत्नम् ।।
data.anv: हनुमत्प्रधानान् led by Hanuman, मृगराजदर्पान् with the majesty of the lion, कृतार्थान् acomplished ones, तान् them, शाखामृगान् vanaras (who live on trees), राघवाभ्यां सह Rama and others, द्रष्टुम् to see, सीताधिगमेन to see Sita, प्रयत्नम् endeavour, श्रोतुं च to hear, इच्छामि desiring.
data.md: Along with these two descendants of Raghu, I long to know soon from these monkeys headed by Hanumān, and proud like lions, what they have settled for the regaining of Sītā.

data.v: सुग्रीवेणैवमुक्तस्तु हृष्टो दधिमुखः कपिः । राघवं लक्ष्मणं चैव सुग्रीवं चाभ्यवादयत् ।।
data.es: Pleased with Sugriva's command (to send forth Angada and Hanuman) Dadhimukha offered salutations to Sugriva, Rama and Lakshmana.
data.anv: सुग्रीवेण by Sugriva, एवम् in that way, उक्तः spoken, कपिः monkey, दधिमुखः Dadhimukha, हृष्टः pleased, राघवम् Rama, लक्ष्मणं चैव and also Lakshmana, सुग्रीवं च and Sugriva, अभ्यवादयत् offered salutations.
data.md: Being thus addressed by Sugrīva, the monkey Dadhimuklia, delighted, bowed to him, Rāghava and Laksmana.

data.v: स प्रणम्य च सुग्रीवं राघवौ च महाबलौ । वानरैः सहितैः शूरैर्दिवमेवोत्पपात ह ।।
data.es: Dadhimukha offered his obeisance to Sugriva and the mighty Rama and Lakshmana and rose up to the sky followed by the vanaras.
data.anv: सः he, Dadhimukha, सुग्रीवम् to Sugriva, महाबलौ mighty strong, राघवौ च Rama, प्रणम्य offering obeisance, शूरैः heroes, वानरैः vanaras, सहितः followed by, दिवमेव to the sky, उत्पपात rose up.
data.md: And adoring Sugrīva and the highly powerful descendants of Raghu, he along with other heroic monkeys, leaped up in the sky.

data.v: स यथैवागतः पूर्वं तथैव त्वरितो गतः । निपत्य गगनाद्भूमौ तद्वनं प्रविवेश ह ।।
data.es: Descending into Madhuvanam, Dadhimukha saw all the monkey troops free from intoxication (of honeywine).
data.anv: मधुवनम् Madhuvanam, प्रविष्टः entered, सः he, विमदान् intoxication, मदूदकम् honey and water, मेहमानान् voiding urine, सर्वान् all, हरियूथपान् troops of vanaras, ददर्श saw.
data.md: He went away with the same speed with which he came and leaping down on the earth from the sky, entered the orchard.

data.v: स प्रविष्टो मधुवनं ददर्श हरियूथपान् । विमदानुद्धतान्सर्वान्मेहमानान्मधूदकम् ।।
data.es: Descending into Madhuvanam, Dadhimukha saw all the monkey troops free from intoxication (of honeywine).
data.anv: मधुवनम् Madhuvanam, प्रविष्टः entered, सः he, विमदान् intoxication, मदूदकम् honey and water, मेहमानान् voiding urine, सर्वान् all, हरियूथपान् troops of vanaras, ददर्श saw.
data.md: And entering that forest he beheld all the leaders of the monkeys spending the hours delightedly, having passed urine, the outcome of honey.

data.v: स तानुपागमद्वीरो बद्ध्वा करपुटाञ्जलिम् । उवाच वचनं श्लक्ष्णमिदं हृष्टवदङ्गदम् ।।
data.es: Heroic Dadhimukha went to Angada, holding his cupped palms reverentially and spoke these conciliatory words with joy:
data.anv: वीरः hero, सः he, करपुटाञ्जलिम् cupping his palms reverentially, बद्ध्वा holding, तान् him, उपागमत् returned, हृष्टवत् with joy, अङ्गदम् Angada, श्लक्ष्णम् conciliatory, इदं वचनम् these words, उवाच spoken.
data.md: And approaching them, the hero, with folded hands and delighted, addressed Angada, with the following words.

data.v: सौम्य रोषो न कर्तव्यो यदेभिरभिवारितः । अज्ञानाद्रक्षिभिः क्रोधाद्भवन्तः प्रतिषेधिताः ।।
data.es: "O handsome one, do not react harshly at these guards who have obstructed your companions out of ignorance and fury.
data.anv: सौम्य prince of mild disposition, एतत् all this, यत् परिवारितम् that your companions, रोषः harsh, न कर्तव्यः not react, भवन्तः you, रक्षिभिः even the guards, अज्ञानात् out of ignorance, क्रोधात् fury, प्रतिषेधिताः have obstructed you.
data.md: O gentle one, do you not take offence, for these monkeys, protecting the garden enraged, unwittingly prevented you.

data.v: युवराजस्त्वमीशश्च वनस्यास्य महाबल । मौर्ख्यात्पूर्वं कृतो दोषस्तद्भवान्क्षन्तुमर्हति ।।
data.es: "O mighty Angada you are heir apparent and also king. Out of foolishness I obstructed you. You ought to pardon me this mistake.
data.anv: महाबल mighty, त्वम् you, युवराजः heir apparent, अस्य वनस्य at this garden, ईशश्च king also, पूर्वम् earlier, मौर्ख्यात् out of foolishness, दोषः mistake, कृतः did, तम् to you, भवान् you, क्षन्तुम् be at peace, अर्हति is proper.

data.v: यथैव हि पिता तेऽभूत्पूर्वं हरिगणेश्वरः । तथा त्वमपि सुग्रीवो नान्यस्तु हरिसत्तम ।।
आख्यातं हि मया गत्वा पितृव्यस्य तवानघ । इहोपयानं सर्वेषामेतेषां वनचारिणाम् ।।
data.es: "O blameless prince I have already told your father's elder brother and all the forestdwellers about your arrival here.
data.anv: अनघ blameless, मया I, गत्वा gone, तव your, पितृव्यस्य elder brother of your father, सर्वेषाम् all, एतेषाम् your people, वनचारिणाम् forestdwellers, इह here, उपयातम् your arrival, आख्यातं हि indeed told.
data.md: O innocent prince, I have related all about this to your uncle. When I described to him, the arrival of all these forest rangers, as well as of yours accompanied by them, and the destruction of this garden by you all, he was not the least offended, rather delighted.

data.v: स त्वदागमनं श्रुत्वा सहैभिर्हरियूथपैः । प्रहृष्टो न तु रुष्टोऽसौ वनं श्रुत्वा प्रधर्षितम् ।।
data.es: "He was not angry at your destruction of the garden. On the other hand, he was very glad to hear about your arrival.
data.anv: सः he, एभिः these, सह with, त्वदागमनम् your arrival, श्रुत्वा hearing, प्रहृष्टः very glad, तु you, वनम् garden, प्रधर्षितम् destroying, श्रुत्वा having heard, असौ he was, न रुष्टः not angry.
data.md: O innocent prince, I have related all about this to your uncle. When I described to him, the arrival of all these forest rangers, as well as of yours accompanied by them, and the destruction of this garden by you all, he was not the least offended, rather delighted.

data.v: प्रहृष्टो मां पितृव्यस्ते सुग्रीवो वानरेश्वरः । शीघ्रं प्रेषय सर्वांस्तानिति होवाच पार्थिवः ।।
data.es: "Your father's brother, Sugriva, the lord of vanaras felt very glad and indeed asked me to send you quickly."
data.anv: ते पितृव्यः your father's brother, वानरेश्वरः lord of vanaras, पार्थिवः king, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, प्रहृष्टः happily, तान् सर्वान् all of them, शीघ्रम् quickly, प्रेषय send, इति this, माम् to me, उवाच ह said indeed.
data.md: And worked up with joy your uncle Sugrīva, the lord of earth and monkeys, said “Send them all here speedily."

data.v: श्रुत्वा दधिमुखस्यैतद्वचनं श्लक्ष्णमङ्गदः । अब्रवीत्तान्हरिश्रेष्ठो वाक्यं वाक्यविशारदः ।।
data.es: At these good words from Dadhimukha, Angada, the monkey leader, an eloquent speaker said this:.
data.anv: दधिमुखस्य to Dadhumukha, इदम् this, श्लक्ष्णम् very good, वचनम् these words, श्रुत्वा having heard, हरिश्रेष्ठः monkey leader, वाक्यविशारदः eloquent in speech, अङ्गदः Angada, तान् to them, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Hearing those words from Dadhimukha, Angada, the foremost of the monkeys and skilled in speech, addressed them all, saying.

data.v: शङ्के श्रुतोऽयं वृत्तान्तो रामेण हरियूथपाः । तत्क्षमं नेह नः स्थातुं कृते कार्ये परंतपाः ।।
data.es: "O scorcher of enemies I presume Rama has already heard the news of our arrival on accomplishment of the task. Hence it is not proper for us to tarry here.
data.anv: परन्तपाः scorcher of enemies, हरियूथपाः leader of monkeys, अयं वृत्तान्तः about this here, रामेण by Rama, श्रुतः having heard, शङ्के I presume, तत् that, कार्ये task, कृते having done, इह here, स्थातुम् to be here, नः for us, न क्षमम् not proper.
data.md: O you leaders of the monkey hosts, I fear, Rāma has heard all about this. Dadhimukha relates everything joyfully and hence I infer this. And our work finished, O slayer of foes, it dose not behove us to remain here (any longer).

data.v: पीत्वा मधु यथाकामं विश्रान्ता वनचारिणः । किं शेषं गमनं तत्र सुग्रीवो यत्र मे गुरुः ।।
data.es: "The vanaras of the forest have taken rest after drinking as much honey as they desired. What is left here to do? We have to go wherever Sugriva is."
data.anv: वनचारिणः forestrangers, vanaras, यथाकामम् as they desire, मधु honey, पीत्वा having drunk, विश्रान्ताः rested, किम् what, शेषम् is left, मे my, गुरुः king, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, यत्र where, तत्र there, गमनम् have to go.
data.md: You have all drunk honey at your pleasure and there is nothing left and you should now go where the monkey king Sugrīva is.

data.v: सर्वे यथा मां वक्ष्यन्ति समेत्य हरियूथपाः । तथास्मि कर्ता कर्तव्ये भवद्भिः परवानहम् ।।
data.es: Angada said to the vanara troops assembled, "Tell me what we have to do. I shall act as you wish.
data.anv: सर्वे all, हरियूथपाः monkey troops, समेत्य assembled together, माम् me, यथा like that, वक्ष्यन्ति would tell, यथा in that way, कर्ता we are to do, अस्मि we, कर्तव्ये in our duty, अहम् I am, भवद्भिः as you say, परवान् have to do.
data.md: O leading monkeys, I shall follow what you will in a band desire me to do. In action I am subordinate to you all.

data.v: नाज्ञापयितुमीशोऽहं युवराजोऽस्मि यद्यपि । अयुक्तं कृतकर्माणो यूयं धर्षयितुं मया ।।
data.es: "Even though I am heir apparent, it is not proper for me to order you.You have accomplished the purpose and to command you is not befitting on my part."
data.anv: अहम् I am, युवराजः heir apparent, अस्मि यद्यपि even though I am, आज्ञापयितुम् to order you, न ईशः not lord, कृतकर्माणः accomplished dones, यूयम् troops, मया by me, धर्षयितुम् ordering, अयुक्तम् not proper.
data.md: I am not justified to command although I am a prince. You are all of accomplished actions, it is not proper to repress you forcibly.

data.v: ब्रुवतश्चाङ्गदश्चैवं श्रुत्वा वचनमव्ययम् । प्रहृष्टमनसो वाक्यमिदमूचुर्वनौकसः ।।
data.es: On hearing Angada's valuable words said in that way, the vanaras repled:
data.anv: एवम् in that way, ब्रुवतः when said, अङ्गदस्य by Angada, अव्ययम् priceless, वचनम् words, श्रुत्वा having heard, वनौकसः forest dwellers, प्रहृष्टमनः glad at heart, इदम् these, ऊचुः said.
data.md: Hearing those sweet words of the prince Angada, the monkeys delightedly replied, saying.

data.v: एवं वक्ष्यति को राजन्प्रभुः सन्वानरर्षभ । ऐश्वर्यमदमत्तो हि सर्वोऽहमिति मन्यते ।।
data.es: "O king O bull among monkeys we think you are an exception to those to whom prosperity brings arrogance.
data.anv: वानरर्षभ bull among vanaras, राजन् O king, प्रभुः सन् who is lord, कः who, एवम् in that way, वक्ष्यति said so, सर्वः all others, ऐश्वर्यमदमत्तः arrogant on account of prosperity, अहम् I, इति thus, मन्यते हि think .
data.md: O king, O foremost of monkeys, who else can speak thus being a master? Any one else, we think, is proud of his wealth.

data.v: तव चेदं सुसदृशं वाक्यं नान्यस्य कस्यचित् । संनतिर्हि तवाख्याति भविष्यच्छुभभाग्यताम् ।।
data.es: "You alone could speak such words. Your humility speaks of your fitness for a bright future.
data.anv: इदं वाक्यम् these words, तव च you alone would have said, सुसदृशम् your humility, अन्यस्य in others, कस्यचित्  you only, न not, तव your, सन्नतिः humble, भविष्यच्छुभयोग्यताम् fit for a bright future, आख्याति speaks of.
data.md: Such like words become you only and none else. Your humility speaks of your future greatness.

data.v: सर्वे वयमपि प्राप्तास्तत्र गन्तुं कृतक्षणाः । स यत्र हरिवीराणां सुग्रीवः पतिरव्ययः ।।
data.anv: प्राप्ताः come here, वयम् us, सर्वेऽपि all of us, हरिवीराणाम् vanara heroes, पतिः lord, अव्ययः one who is immortal, सः सुग्रीवः that Sugriva, यत्र to him, तत्र there, गन्तुम् to go, कृतक्षणाः ready at any moment.
data.md: We are all anxious to go there, where Sugriva, the king of the monkeys, is.

data.v: त्वया ह्यनुक्तैर्हरिभिर्नैव शक्यं पदात्पदम् । क्वचिद्गन्तुं हरिश्रेष्ठ ब्रूमः सत्यमिदं तु ते ।।
data.es: "O Angada the best of vanaras without your command none will find it possible to put forward even a single step."
data.anv: हरिश्रेष्ठ best of the vanaras, Angada, त्वया your, अनुक्तै: order, हरिभिः vanaras, पदात् on foot, पदम् one step, क्वचित् not even, गन्तुम् to go, न शक्यम् not possible, सत्यम् it is true, इदम् this, ते to you, ब्रूमः appealed.
data.md: Verily we speak to you, O foremost of monkeys, that without your permission, none among us, is capable of advancing a single step.”

data.v: एवं तु वदतां तेषामङ्गदः प्रत्यभाषत । बाढं गच्छाम इत्युक्त्वा उत्पपात महीतलात् ।।
data.es: Thus addressed by all the vanaras, Angada said 'Well, let us go'. Then the powerful vanaras rose up the sky.
data.anv: तेषाम् those vanaras, एवम् that way, वदताम् spoken, अङ्गदः Angada, बाढम् very good, गच्छाम let us go, प्रत्युवाच ह replied, इति thus, उक्त्वा having spoken, महाबलाः powerful vanaras, खम् to the sky, उत्पेतुः rose up.

data.v: उत्पतन्तमनूत्पेतुः सर्वे ते हरियूथपाः । कृत्वाकाशं निराकाशं यज्ञोत्क्षिप्ता इवानलाः ।।
data.es: All the vanara troops sprang up into the air as though there was no sky, like stones shattered by machines from the mountains rise up.
data.anv: सर्वे all, ते हरियूथपाः vanara troops, यन्त्रोत्क्षिप्ताः  stones shattered by machines, अचलाः mountain, इव like, आकाशम् sky, निराकाशम् as if there is no sky, कृत्वा did, उत्पतन्तम् rising up, अनूत्पेतुः sprang up.
data.md: They addressing him thus, Angada replied"All right, let us all go.” Saying this he leaped up in the sky and was followed by all those monkeys, clouding the welkin as if with stones thrown up by a tool.

data.v: तेऽम्बरं सहसोत्पत्य वेगवन्तः प्लवंगमाः । विनदन्तो महानादं घना वातेरिता यथा ।।
data.es: The swift monkeys roared aloud as though they went up the sky like thundering clouds driven by the wind.
data.anv: वेगवन्तः swift, ते प्लवङ्गमाः those monkeys, महानादम् roared aloud, विनदन्तः noise, वातेरिताः driven by the Wind, घनाः यथा like heavy clouds, सहसा at once, अम्बरम् to the sky, उत्पत्य went up.
data.md: And placing before them Angada and Hanumān, the monkeys leaping vehemently up in the sky roared like to clouds driven by the wind.

data.v: अङ्गदे ह्यननुप्राप्ते सुग्रीवो वानराधिपः । उवाच शोकोपहतं रामं कमललोचनम् ।।
data.es: Seeing the griefstricken, lotuseyed Rama, the lord of the vanaras Sugriva said this before the arrival of Angada:
data.anv: अङ्गदे Angada, अननुप्राप्ते before he came, वानराधिपः lord of the vanaras, सुग्रीवः Sugriva, शोकोपहतम् stricken with grief, कमललोचनम् lotus eyed, रामम् Rama, उवाच said.
data.md: And Angada nearing, Sugrīva, the lord of the monkeys, spoke to the lotus-eyed Rāma, stricken with grief, saying.

data.v: समाश्वसिहि भद्रं ते दृष्टा देवी न संशयः । नागन्तुमिह शक्यं तैरतीते समये हि नः ।।
data.es: "Trust me, Rama. Be blessed. The vanaras have seen the divine lady. There is no doubt. It is not possible for them to come here after exceeding the time limit (in their search for Sita).
data.anv: समाश्वसिहि trust me, ते to you, भद्रम् auspicious, देवी queen, दृष्टा have seen, संशयः doubt, न not, नः us, समये time, अतीते exceeded, तैः they, इह here, आगन्तुम् to come, न शक्यम् not possible.
data.md: May good betide you. Do you console yourself. The worshipful dame has been found out; there is not the least doubt about it. Or else they would not have come as the time is already past.

data.v: न मत्सकाशमागच्छेत्कृत्ये हि विनिपातिते । युवराजो महाबाहुः प्लवतां प्रवरोऽङ्गदः ।।
data.es: "My heir apparent, the strongarmed Angada, and the best of the monkeys is endowed with virtues. He would not come near me if his mission had failed.
data.anv: युवराजः heir apparent, महाबाहुः strongarmed one, प्लवताम् leaping, प्रवरः endowed with good virtues, अङ्गदः Angada, कृत्ये mission, विनिपातिते has failed, मत्सकाशम् near me, नागच्छेत् will not come.
data.md: I (further more) infer this from Angada's joy, O you of auspicious presence. Without being successful in his mission, the large-armed prince, Angada, the foremost of the monkeys, would not have come to me.

data.v: यद्यप्यकृतकृत्यानामीदृशः स्यादुपक्रमः । भवेत्तु दीनवदनो भ्रान्तविप्लुतमानसः ।।
data.es: "In case the vanaras have returned without accomplishing the task, Angada would have assumed a pathetic face, perplexed and unsteady in mind.
data.anv: अकृतकृत्यानाम् in case they have not accomplished, उपक्रमः return, ईदृशः this way, यद्यपि स्यात् acted that way, सः he, दीनवदनः pathetic face, भ्रान्त विप्लुतमानसः perplexed and unsteady in mind, भवेत् would be.
data.md: If the monkeys had engaged in such an unfair proceeding without being successful in their mission, Angada would have looked poorly and his mind would have been overwhelmed with grief and forgetfulness.

data.v: पितृपैतामहं चैतत्पूर्वकैरभिरक्षितम् । न मे मधुवनं हन्यादहृष्टः प्लवगेश्वरः ।।
data.es: "If Angada, lord of the vanaras had not been happy, he would not have destroyed the Madhuvanam of my father's and my grandfather's time. O Rama, follower of righteous practices, Kausalya has an excellent son in you. Trust me.
data.anv: प्लवगेश्वरः lord of monkeys, अहृष्टः not been happy, पितृपैतामहम् father and grandfather's time, पूर्वकैः ancestors, अभिरक्षितम् protected, मे मधुवनम् my Madhuvanam, न हन्यात् not destroy, कौसल्यासुप्रजाः Kausalya's son, सुव्रत one who pracitces good traditions, राम Rama, समाश्वसिहि trust me.
data.md: Without beholding the daughter of the king Janaka they would not have dared to destroy Madhuvana obtained and preserved by my forefathers.

data.v: कौसल्या सुप्रजा राम समाश्वसिहि सुव्रत । दृष्टा देवी न संदेहो न चान्येन हनूमता । न ह्यन्यः कर्मणो हेतुः साधने तद्विधो भवेत् ।।
data.es: "Hanuman is the one who has accomplished this task. Who else can? No doubt, he has seen Sita.
data.anv: कर्मणो this task, हेतुस्साधनेऽस्य the reason for accomplishing, देवी Sita, दृष्टा saw, सन्देहः doubt, न  not, अन्येन not others, न not, हनुमता Hanuman.
data.md: Do you console yourself, O Räma, by whom Kausalyā has become the mother of a good son. O you, rigidly observing any religious vow or obligation, forsooth has Hanumān behold the worshipful dame and none else.

data.v: हनूमति हि सिद्धिश्च मतिश्च मतिसत्तम । व्यवसायश्च वीर्यं च सूर्ये तेज इव ध्रुवम् ।।
data.es: "O Rama, the best among the wise just like the luminosity that abides in the Sun, capacity to succeed, energy, intelligence, even courage and steadfastness reside in Hanuman.
data.anv: मतिसत्तम best one among the wise, हनूमति Hanuman, सूर्ये Sun, तेजः इव like the luminosity, सिद्धिश्च capacity to succeed, मतिश्च intelligence, व्यवसायश्च effort, वीर्यं च and even courage, ध्रुवम् steadfast.

data.v: जाम्बवान्यत्र नेता स्यादङ्गदश्च बलेश्वरः । हनूमांश्चाप्यधिष्ठाता न तस्य गतिरन्यथा ।।
data.es: Where Jambavan, Angada and Hanuman are leaders directing the task of the army it must have been accomplished.
data.anv: यत्र where, जाम्बवान् Jambavan, नेता is the leader, स्यात् remains, महाबलः strong, अङ्गदश्च Angada also, हनुमांश्च and Hanuman, अधिष्ठाता directing, तस्य that, गतिः will be done, अन्यथा otherwise, न not.
data.md: That work is sure to succeed whose leading spirits are the mighty Jāmbavāna and Angada, and worker is Hanumăn.

data.v: मा भूश्चिन्ता समायुक्तः संप्रत्यमितविक्रम ।।
ततः किल किला शब्दं शुश्रावासन्नमम्बरे । हनूमत्कर्मदृप्तानां नर्दतां काननौकसाम् । किष्किन्धामुपयातानां सिद्धिं कथयतामिव ।।
data.es: "You are extremely valiant and it is unbecoming of you to be anxious at this time Rama. Just then chatterings of the monkeys were heard from the sky as they roared in pride talking of Hanuman's achievement. Having successfully completed the errand, they have arrived at Kishkinda.
data.anv: अमितविक्रमः extremely valiant, सम्प्रति at this time, चिन्तासमायुक्तः anxious, मा भूः do not, ततः at that time, हनुमत्कर्मदृप्तानाम् in the pride of Hanuman's success, नार्धताम् roaring, सिद्धिम् successfully completed the work, कथयतामिव talking, किष्किन्धाम् in Kishkinda, उपयातानाम् have reached, काननौकसाम् forestdwellers, vanaras, अम्बरे in the sky, आसन्नम् have arrived, किलकिलाशब्दम् chatterings, शुश्राव was heard.
data.md: Thereupon he heard in the sky the joyous sounds of the monkeys proud on account of Hanuman's work, proceeding towards Kişkindhā and as if announcing their success.

data.v: ततः श्रुत्वा निनादं तं कपीनां कपिसत्तमः । आयताञ्चितलाङ्गूलः सोऽभवद्धृष्टमानसः ।।
data.es: The great Sugriva heard the roar of the monkeys and was extremely happy. He kept raising and shaking his long tail in joy.
data.anv: ततः then, सः कपिसत्तमः that great monkey, Sugriva, कपीनाम् of the monkeys, तं निनादम् that roar, श्रुत्वा having heard, आयताञ्चितलाङ्गूलः lifting and shaking the long tail, हृष्टमानसः extremely happy, अभवत् remained.
data.md: Thereupon hearing the noise of these monkeys Sugriva, their chief, being greatly delighted, uplifted his tail.

data.v: आजग्मुस्तेऽपि हरयो रामदर्शनकाङ्क्षिणः । अङ्गदं पुरतः कृत्वा हनूमन्तं च वानरम् ।।
data.es: The joyful monkeys with Angada and Hanuman leading them descended with eagerness to have a close look at Rama.
